GR14jnass01u:6: nārāyaṇaṃ namas kṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam /
GR14jnass01u:7: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet //
GR14jnass01u:9: kumārādyāś ca munayaḥ siddhāś ca kapilādayaḥ // Jss_1,1.1 //
GR14jnass01u:10: lakṣmī sarasvatī durgā sāvitrī rādhikā parā /
GR14jnass01u:11: bhaktyā namanti yaṃ śaśvat taṃ namāmi parāt paraṃ // Jss_1,1.2 //
GR14jnass01u:12: dhyāyante satataṃ santo yogino vaiṣṇavās tathā /
GR14jnass01u:14: dhyāyet taṃ paramaṃ brahma paramātmānam īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:15: nirīham ati-nirliptam nirguṇaṃ prakṛteḥ paraṃ // Jss_1,1.4 //
GR14jnass01u:17: satyaṃ nityaṃ ca puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ param avyayam // Jss_1,1.5 //
GR14jnass01u:19: svecchā-mayaṃ paraṃ dhāma bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,1.6 //
GR14jnass01u:20: stuvanti vedā yaṃ śaśvann ānantaṃ jānanti yasya te /
GR14jnass01u:21: taṃ staumi paramānandaṃ sānandaṃ nanda-nandanam // Jss_1,1.7 //
GR14jnass01u:23: śrīdaṃ śrīśaṃ śrī-nivāsaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ rādhikeśvaram // Jss_1,1.8 //
GR14jnass01u:25: parāvarāc ca paramād yogīndrāṇāṃ guror guroḥ // Jss_1,1.9 //
GR14jnass01u:27: taj jñāna-mantha-daṇḍena saṃnirmathya navaṃ navam // Jss_1,1.10 //
GR14jnass01u:30: oṃ nārāyaṇāśrame puṇye puṇya-kṣetre ca bhārata /
GR14jnass01u:34: japantaṃ paramaṃ brahma kṛṣṇa ity akṣara-dvayam /
GR14jnass01u:36: papraccha śukadevaś ca sarva-jñaṃ pitaraṃ muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:37: kāraṇaṇ ca purāṇānāṃ purāṇaṃ param avyayam // Jss_1,1.15 //
GR14jnass01u:40: yad yat prakāraṃ jñānaṃ ca nigūḍhaṃ śruti-sammatam // Jss_1,1.16 //
GR14jnass01u:42: tat tat sarvaṃ samālocya māṃ bodhayitum arhasi // Jss_1,1.17 //
GR14jnass01u:44: sa pitā jñāna-dātā yo jñānaṃ tat kṛṣṇa-bhaktidam /
GR14jnass01u:45: sā bhaktiḥ paramā śuddhā kṛṣṇa-dāsya-pradā ca yā // Jss_1,1.18 //
GR14jnass01u:46: tad eva dāsyaṃ śastaṃ yat sākṣāc caraṇa-sevanaṃ /
GR14jnass01u:47: nityaṃ goloka-vāsaṃ ca purataḥ stavanaṃ hareḥ // Jss_1,1.19 //
GR14jnass01u:51: bhaktānāṃ vāñcchitaṃ vastu sāra-bhūtaṃ śrutau śrutam // Jss_1,1.21 //
GR14jnass01u:52: putrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā vyāsadevo jahāsa saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:53: vijñāya jñāninaṃ putraṃ paramāhlādam āpa ha // Jss_1,1.22 //
GR14jnass01u:58: putreṇa bhavatāsmākaṃ kulaṃ muktaṃ ca pāvanam // Jss_1,1.24 //
GR14jnass01u:59: sa putraḥ kṛṣṇa-bhakto yo bhārate suyaśas-karaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:60: punāti puṃsāṃ śatakaṃ janma-mātreṇa līlayā // Jss_1,1.25 //
GR14jnass01u:62: sodarān bāndhavāṃś caiva bhṛtyān patnīṃ sahātmajām // Jss_1,1.26 //
GR14jnass01u:66: kṛṣṇa-bhakto vasiṣṭas tu tat suto vaiṣṇavaḥ svayam // Jss_1,1.28 //
GR14jnass01u:71: gurur me bhagavān sākṣād yogīndro nārado muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:72: guror gurur me śambhuś ca yogīndrāṇāṃ guror guruḥ // Jss_1,1.31 //
GR14jnass01u:73: teṣāṃ puṇyena putras tvaṃ puṇya-rāśiś ca mūrtimān /
GR14jnass01u:74: padmānāṃ mama puṃsāṃ ca prakāśo bhāskaraḥ svayam // Jss_1,1.32 //
GR14jnass01u:76: sarasvatīṃ namas kṛtya jñānaṃ vakṣye sanātanam // Jss_1,1.33 //
GR14jnass01u:78: pañca-saṃvādam iṣṭaṃ ca bhaktānām abhivāñcchitam // Jss_1,1.34 //
GR14jnass01u:79: prāṇādhikaṃ priyaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ jñānāmṛtaṃ śubhaṃ /
GR14jnass01u:82: hi goloke śata-śṛṅge ca parvate // Jss_1,1.35 //
GR14jnass01u:84: purato rādhikāyāś ca brahmāṇaṃ kamalodbhavam // Jss_1,1.36 //
GR14jnass01u:85: tam uvāca mahā-bhaktaṃ stuvantaṃ praṇataṃ sutam /
GR14jnass01u:86: pañca-rātram idaṃ puṇyaṃ śrutvā ca jagatāṃ vidhiḥ // Jss_1,1.37 //
GR14jnass01u:88: bhaktyā tam pūjayām āsa śaṅkaraḥ paramādaram // Jss_1,1.38 //
GR14jnass01u:89: sukhāsane sukhāsīnaṃ svasthaṃ bhaktaṃ ca pūjitam /
GR14jnass01u:90: papraccha vārtāṃ vinayī vinayena sukhāvahām // Jss_1,1.39 //
GR14jnass01u:91: sarvaṃ taṃ kathayām āsa pañca-rātrādikaṃ śubham /
GR14jnass01u:92: vasantaṃ vaṭa-mūle ca svarge mandākinī-taṭe // Jss_1,1.40 //
GR14jnass01u:93: yogīndrair api siddhendrair munīndraiś ca stutaṃ prabhuṃ /
GR14jnass01u:94: jñānāmṛtaṃ tam uktvā sa brahma-lokaṃ jagāma ha // Jss_1,1.41 //
GR14jnass01u:95: śambhuś ca kathayām āsa sva-śiṣyaṃ nāradaṃ munim /
GR14jnass01u:96: nāradaḥ kathayām āsa puṣkare sūrya-parvaṇi // Jss_1,1.42 //
GR14jnass01u:97: māṃ bhaktam anuraktaṃ ca puṇyāhe muni-saṃsadi /
GR14jnass01u:100: rātraṃ ca jñāna-vacanaṃ jñānaṃ pañca-vidhaṃ smṛtam /
GR14jnass01u:101: tenedaṃ pañca-rātraṃ ca pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ // Jss_1,1.44 //
GR14jnass01u:103: tato mṛtyuñjayaḥ śambhuḥ saṃprāpa kṛṣṇa-vaktrataḥ // Jss_1,1.45 //
GR14jnass01u:104: jñānam dvitīyaṃ paramaṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ ca vāñcchitam /
GR14jnass01u:105: paraṃ mukti-pradaṃ śuddhaṃ yato līnaṃ hareḥ pade // Jss_1,1.46 //
GR14jnass01u:106: jñānaṃ śuddhaṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca maṅgalaṃ kṛṣṇa-bhaktidam /
GR14jnass01u:107: tad-dāsyam adhīṣṭaṃ ca yato dāsyaṃ labhed dhareḥ // Jss_1,1.47 //
GR14jnass01u:109: sarvasvaṃ yogināṃ putra siddhānāṃ ca sukha-pradam // Jss_1,1.48 //
GR14jnass01u:110: aṇimā laghimā vyāptiḥ prākāmyaṃ mahimā tathā /
GR14jnass01u:111: īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca tathākāmāvasāyitā // Jss_1,1.49 //
GR14jnass01u:115: siddhaṃ ca ṣoḍaśa-vidhaṃ jñānināṃ ca yato bhavet // Jss_1,1.51 //
GR14jnass01u:116: jñānaṃ ca paramaṃ proktaṃ tad vai vaiṣayikaṃ nṛṇāṃ /
GR14jnass01u:117: yad iṣṭa-devī māyā sā paraṃ saṃmoha-kāraṇaṃ // Jss_1,1.52 //
GR14jnass01u:119: poṣanaṃ sva-kuṭumbānāṃ svātmanaś ca niranratam // Jss_1,1.53 //
GR14jnass01u:120: prathamaṃ sāttvikaṃ jñānaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca tad eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:121: nairguṇyaṃ ca tṛtīyaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca sarvataḥ param // Jss_1,1.54 //
GR14jnass01u:122: caturtham ca rājasikaṃ bhaktas tan nābhivāñcchati /
GR14jnass01u:123: pañcamaṃ tāmasaṃ jñānaṃ vidvāṃs tan nābhivāñcchati // Jss_1,1.55 //
GR14jnass01u:124: jñānaṃ pañca-vidhaṃ proktaṃ pañca-rātraṃ vidur budhāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:125: pañca-rātraṃ sapta-vidhaṃ jñānināṃ jñānadaṃ param // Jss_1,1.56 //
GR14jnass01u:126: brāhmaṃ śaivaṃ ca kaumāraṃ vāsiṣṭaṃ kāpilaṃ param /
GR14jnass01u:127: gautamīyaṃ nāradīyam idaṃ sapta-vidhaṃ smṛtam // Jss_1,1.57 //
GR14jnass01u:129: ṣaṭ pañca-rātraṃ vedāś ca purāṇāni ca sarvaśaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:130: itihāsaṃ dharma-śāstraṃ śātraṃ ca siddhi-yoga-jam // Jss_1,1.58 //
GR14jnass01u:131: dṛṣṭvā sarvaṃ samālokya jñānaṃ saṃprāpya śaṅkarāt /
GR14jnass01u:132: jñānāmṛtaṃ pañca-rātraṃ cakāra nārado muniḥ // Jss_1,1.59 //
GR14jnass01u:134: sarvasvaṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca priyaṃ prāṇādhikaṃ suta // Jss_1,1.60 //
GR14jnass01u:138: paripūrṇatamaḥ śrīmān yathā kṛṣṇaḥ sureṣu ca // Jss_1,1.62 //
GR14jnass01u:139: yathā devīṣu pūjyā sā mūla-prakṛtir īśvarī /
GR14jnass01u:140: vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ jñānināṃ yogināṃ śivaḥ // Jss_1,1.63 //
GR14jnass01u:142: brahmā ca veda-viduṣāṃ pūjyānāṃ ca gaṇeśvaraḥ // Jss_1,1.64 //
GR14jnass01u:144: bṛhaspatir buddhimatāṃ siddhānāṃ kapilo yathā // Jss_1,1.65 //
GR14jnass01u:145: yogīndrānāṃ satāṃ śuddha ṛṣir nārāyaṇo yathā /
GR14jnass01u:146: kavīnāṃ ca yathā śukraḥ paṇḍitānāṃ bṛhaspatiḥ // Jss_1,1.66 //
GR14jnass01u:147: saritām ca yathā gaṅgā samudrāṇāṃ jalārṇavaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:148: vṛndāvanaṃ vanānāṃ ca varṣānāṃ bhārataṃ yathā // Jss_1,1.67 //
GR14jnass01u:149: puṣkaraṃ tatra tīrthānāṃ pūjyānāṃ vaiṣṇavo yathā /
GR14jnass01u:150: ātmākāśo yathāptānāṃ yathā kāśī purīṣu ca // Jss_1,1.68 //
GR14jnass01u:152: puṣpāṇāṃ pārijātaś ca patrāṇāṃ tulasī yathā // Jss_1,1.69 //
GR14jnass01u:153: mantrāṇāṃ kṛṣṇa-mantraś ca yathā vidyā dhaneṣv api /
GR14jnass01u:154: yathā tejasvināṃ sūryo miṣṭānām amṛtaṃ yathā // Jss_1,1.70 //
GR14jnass01u:155: ādhārāṇāṃ ca sthūlānāṃ mahā-viṣṇur yathā suta /
GR14jnass01u:156: sūkṣmāṇāṃ paramāṇuś ca guruṇāṃ mantra-tantra-daḥ // Jss_1,1.71 //
GR14jnass01u:157: putraś ca sneha-pātrāṇāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ yathā śaśī /
GR14jnass01u:158: yathā ghṛtaṃ ca gavyānāṃ śasyānāṃ dhānyam īpsitam // Jss_1,1.72 //
GR14jnass01u:159: śāstrāṇāṃ ca yathā vedāḥ sāśramāṇāṃ yathā dvijaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:161: yathā chandasi gāyatrī durgā śaktimatīṣv api /
GR14jnass01u:162: pati-vratāsu laksmīś ca kṣamāśīlāsu medinī // Jss_1,1.74 //
GR14jnass01u:164: hanumān vānarāṇāṃ ca pakṣiṇāṃ garuḍo yathā // Jss_1,1.75 //
GR14jnass01u:166: śālagrāmaś ca yantrāṇāṃ pūjāsu kṛṣṇa-pūjanam // Jss_1,1.76 //
GR14jnass01u:167: ekādaśī vratānāṃ ca tapaḥsv anaśanaṃ yathā /
GR14jnass01u:168: yajñānāṃ japa-yajñaś ca satyaṃ dharmeṣu putraka // Jss_1,1.77 //
GR14jnass01u:169: suśīlaṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca puṇyeṣu kṛṣṇa-kīrtanam /
GR14jnass01u:170: śobhāśu sukha-dṛśyeṣu prabhā tejaḥsu sarvataḥ // Jss_1,1.78 //
GR14jnass01u:172: lokānām api lokeśaḥ śeṣo nāgeṣu pūjitaḥ // Jss_1,1.79 //
GR14jnass01u:173: sudarśanaṃ ca śastrāṇāṃ viśvakarmā ca śilpinām /
GR14jnass01u:174: dharmiṣṭheṣu dayāvatsu devarṣisu mahatsu ca // Jss_1,1.80 //
GR14jnass01u:176: evaṃ ca sarva-śāstreṣu pañca-rātraṃ ca pūjitam // Jss_1,1.81 //
GR14jnass01u:177: yathā nipīya pīyūṣaṃ na spṛhā cānya-vastuṣu /
GR14jnass01u:178: pañca-rātram abhijñāya nānyeṣu ca spṛhā satām // Jss_1,1.82 //
GR14jnass01u:184: kutra vā pañca-rātraṃ ca nāradasya ca dhīmate /
GR14jnass01u:185: pradattaṃ śambhunā tāta tan me vyākhyātum arhasi // Jss_1,2.1 //
GR14jnass01u:188: adhītya sarvān vedāṃś ca vedāṅgāṇ pitur antike /
GR14jnass01u:189: jagāma tītrhaṃ kedāraṃ supraśastaṃ ca bhārate // Jss_1,2.2 //
GR14jnass01u:192: tapaś cakāra sa munir divyaṃ varṣa-sahasrakam /
GR14jnass01u:193: pitroktenaiva vidhinā satataṃ saṃyutaḥ śuciḥ // Jss_1,2.4 //
GR14jnass01u:198: ādhārito yadi haris tapasā tataḥ kim /
GR14jnass01u:199: nādhārito yadi haris tapasā tataḥ kim /
GR14jnass01u:200: antar bahir yadi haris tapasā tataḥ kim /
GR14jnass01u:201: nāntar bahir yadi haris tapasā tataḥ kim // Jss_1,2.6 //
GR14jnass01u:202: virama virama brahman kiṃ tapasyāsu vatsa /
GR14jnass01u:203: vraja vraja dvija śīghraṃ śaṅkaraṃ jñāna-sindhum /
GR14jnass01u:206: iti śrutvā ca sa munir vimanāḥ svar-ṇadī-taṭe /
GR14jnass01u:207: cakārārthānusandhānaṃ na prasannam ca tan manaḥ // Jss_1,2.8 //
GR14jnass01u:208: ruroda svar-ṇadī-tīre smāraṃ smāraṃ hareḥ padam /
GR14jnass01u:209: dadarśa puratas tātaṃ brahmāṇaṃ sakumārakam // Jss_1,2.9 //
GR14jnass01u:210: nanāma sahasā mūrdhnā pitaraṃ taṃ sahodaram /
GR14jnass01u:211: pādyam arghyaṃ ca pradadau javena sādaraṃ muniḥ // Jss_1,2.10 //
GR14jnass01u:213: sukhāsīnaṃ susthiraṃ ca sasmitaṃ ca gata-śramam // Jss_1,2.11 //
GR14jnass01u:214: svātmārāmaṃ pūrṇa-kāmaṃ jñānināṃ ca guror gurum /
GR14jnass01u:216: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā taṃ kātaraṃ vidhiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:217: putreṇa sārddham ālocya vyākhyāṃ kartuṃ samārebhe // Jss_1,2.13 //
GR14jnass01u:221: vedārthaṃ dvi-vidhaṃ śuddhaṃ vyākhyāṃ kurvanti vaidikāḥ // Jss_1,2.14 //
GR14jnass01u:222: ārādhito yadi harir yena puṃsā sva-bhaktitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:223: kiṃ tasya tapasā vyarthaṃ tīrtha-pūtasya nārada // Jss_1,2.15 //
GR14jnass01u:227: punāti sva-sva-bhaktaṃ ca cāndhavaṃś cāvalīlayā // Jss_1,2.17 //
GR14jnass01u:228: nahi dharmo nahi tapaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-sevanāt param /
GR14jnass01u:229: pariśramaṃ ca viphalaṃ tapasā vaiṣṇavasya ca // Jss_1,2.18 //
GR14jnass01u:231: tīrtha-snānam anaśanaṃ vedeṣu ca viḍambanam // Jss_1,2.19 //
GR14jnass01u:233: mantra-grahaṇa-mātreṇa naṣṭaṃ vahnau yathā tṛṇam // Jss_1,2.20 //
GR14jnass01u:234: pavitraḥ paramo vahniḥ pavitraṃ cāmalaṃ jalaṃ /
GR14jnass01u:235: pavitraṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ tīrthaṃ yat tulasī-dalam // Jss_1,2.21 //
GR14jnass01u:237: upasparśa ca bhaktasyāpy ete vāñcchanti sādaram // Jss_1,2.22 //
GR14jnass01u:241: tat-pādodaka-naivedyaṃ nityaṃ bhuṅkte ca yaḥ pumān // Jss_1,2.24 //
GR14jnass01u:243: punāti puṃsāṃ śatakaṃ janma-mātrāt sabāndhavam // Jss_1,2.25 //
GR14jnass01u:245: vyākhyātaṃ karomy anya-pādaṃ yathājñānaṃ miśāmaya // Jss_1,2.26 //
GR14jnass01u:246: nārādhito yadi harir yena puṃsādhamena ca /
GR14jnass01u:247: kiṃ tasya tapasā vyarthaṃ niṣphalaṃ tat-pariśramaḥ // Jss_1,2.27 //
GR14jnass01u:248: vratāny eva hi dānāni tapāṃsy anaśanāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:249: vedopayuktā yajñāś ca karmāṇi ca śubhāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:250: na niṣpunāty abhaktaṃ ca surākumbham ivāpagā // Jss_1,2.28 //
GR14jnass01u:253: ślokārdhaṃ kathitaṃ vatsa kiṃcid eva yathāgamam /
GR14jnass01u:256: antar bahir yadi hair yeṣāṃ puṃsāṃ mahātmanāṃ // Jss_1,2.31 //
GR14jnass01u:257: svapne jāgaraṇe śaśvat tapas teṣāṃ ca niṣphalam /
GR14jnass01u:258: sa eva viṣṇu-tulyo hi tad-aṃśo bhārate mune // Jss_1,2.32 //
GR14jnass01u:261: datvā cakraṃ ca rakṣārthaṃ na niścinto janārdanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:262: svayaṃ tan nikaṭaṃ yāti draṣṭuṃ rakṣaṇāya ca // Jss_1,2.34 //
GR14jnass01u:263: tat-paro hi priyo nāsti kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:264: nahi bhaktāt paraś cātmā prāṇāś cāvayavādayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:265: na lakṣmī rādhikā vāṇī svayaṃbhuḥ śambhur eva ca // Jss_1,2.35 //
GR14jnass01u:266: bhakta-prāṇo hi kṛṣṇaś ca kṛṣṇa-prāṇā hi vaiṣṇavāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:267: dhyāyante vaiṣṇavāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaś ca vaiṣṇavāṃs tathā // Jss_1,2.36 //
GR14jnass01u:268: vyākhyātam ca tri-pādaṃ ca he munīndra yathāgamam /
GR14jnass01u:270: nāntar bahir yadi harir yeṣāṃ puṃsāṃ ca nārada /
GR14jnass01u:271: teṣām api tapo vyartham antar-malina-cetasāṃ // Jss_1,2.38 //
GR14jnass01u:272: kiṃ taj-jñānena tapasā vratena niyamena ca /
GR14jnass01u:277: nityaṃ nityaṃ vidharmeṇa patitāḥ śvapacādhamāḥ // Jss_1,2.41 //
GR14jnass01u:279: nityaṃ te bhuñjate santas tan-naivedyaṃ pādodakam // Jss_1,2.42 //
GR14jnass01u:280: na datvā haraye yas tu yadi bhuṅkte dvijādhamaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:281: annaṃ viṣṭhā-samaṃ mūtra-samaṃ toyaṃ vidur budhāḥ // Jss_1,2.43 //
GR14jnass01u:282: bhuṅkte sva-bhakṣyaṃ kolaś ca mlecchaś ca śvapacādhamaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:283: vipro nityam abhakṣyaṃ ca bhuṅkte ca patitas tataḥ // Jss_1,2.44 //
GR14jnass01u:284: ślokam ekaṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ yathā-jñānaṃ ca nārada /
GR14jnass01u:285: sannibodha parasyārdhaṃ vyākhyānaṃ ca yathocitaṃ // Jss_1,2.45 //
GR14jnass01u:286: tapaso virama brahman vyarthaṃ bhakta-tapo dhruvam /
GR14jnass01u:287: śaṅkaraś ca guruṃ kṛtvā hari-bhaktiṃ labhāciram // Jss_1,2.46 //
GR14jnass01u:289: gurur eva paraṃ brahma karṇa-dhāra-svarūpakaḥ // Jss_1,2.47 //
GR14jnass01u:290: ity evam uktvā tvāṃ devī prajagāma sarasvatī /
GR14jnass01u:291: vyākhyātas tad-abhiprāyaḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te // Jss_1,2.48 //
GR14jnass01u:292: brahmāṇaś ca vacaḥ śrutvā jahāsa yogināṃ guruḥ /
GR14jnass01u:293: sanat-kumāro bhagavān uvāca pitaraṃ śuka // Jss_1,2.49 //
GR14jnass01u:295: pūrva-ślokasya vyākhyānaṃ na buddhaṃ śiśunā mayā /
GR14jnass01u:296: putraṃ śiṣyam abodhaṃ ca yuktaṃ bodhayitum punaḥ // Jss_1,2.50 //
GR14jnass01u:297: ārādhito harir yena tasya vyarthaṃ tapo yadi /
GR14jnass01u:298: nārādhito hair yena tasya vyartaṃ tapo yadi // Jss_1,2.51 //
GR14jnass01u:299: tasyārahitau tau dvau tapasaś ca sthalaṃ kutaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:300: tapaḥ kurvanti ye tāta tvaṃ māṃ bodhaya bālakam // Jss_1,2.52 //
GR14jnass01u:301: putrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sandigdho jagatāṃ guruḥ /
GR14jnass01u:302: dadhyau kṛṣṇa-padāmbhojaṃ paraṃ kalpa-taruṃ śuka // Jss_1,2.53 //
GR14jnass01u:303: kṣaṇaṃ saṃcitya pādābjaṃ prāpa rāddhāntam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:304: vyākhyāṃ kartuṃ samārebhe vidhātā jagatām api // Jss_1,2.54 //
GR14jnass01u:307: dhanyo 'haṃ bhavataḥ putrāt jñānināṃ ca guror guroḥ /
GR14jnass01u:308: viṣṇu-bhaktāc ca dharmiṣṭhāt sat-putrāc ca pitā sukhī // Jss_1,2.55 //
GR14jnass01u:310: mamāpi saphalaṃ janma jīvanaṃ ca tvayā budha // Jss_1,2.56 //
GR14jnass01u:311: nibodha pūrva-ślokārthaṃ punar vyākhyāṃ karomi ca /
GR14jnass01u:312: tathāpi cen na santoṣo bhavān vyākhyāṃ kariṣyati // Jss_1,2.57 //
GR14jnass01u:314: saṃprāptaś ca harir yena vyarthas tasya tapaḥ-śramaḥ // Jss_1,2.58 //
GR14jnass01u:316: svapne jñāne ca jñātas teṣāṃ vyarthas tapaḥ-śramaḥ // Jss_1,2.59 //
GR14jnass01u:318: tīrthaṃ dānaṃ tāpaḥ puṇyaṃ vrataṃ naiva punāti tam // Jss_1,2.60 //
GR14jnass01u:319: yaś ca mūḍhatamo loke yaś ca bhaktiṃ parāṃ gataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:320: tāv ubhau sukha-sedhete tapaḥ kurvanti madhyamāḥ // Jss_1,2.61 //
GR14jnass01u:321: devān anyāṃś ca bhajate hariṃ jānāti tat-paraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:322: tapaḥ karoti taṃ prāptum ākāṅkṣan madhyamo janaḥ // Jss_1,2.62 //
GR14jnass01u:327: atīva mūḍho vipraś ca prāktanād guru-doṣataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:328: tāmaso hi na jānāti śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ tri-guṇāt param // Jss_1,2.65 //
GR14jnass01u:329: ajñānād atha vā jñānāt sat-saṅgād eva prāktanāt /
GR14jnass01u:330: bhuṅkte naivedyaṃ īśasya kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,2.66 //
GR14jnass01u:331: sa ca mukto bhavet putra mucyate sarva-pātakāt /
GR14jnass01u:332: sa yāti divya-yānena golokaṃ lokam uttamam // Jss_1,2.67 //
GR14jnass01u:334: atīva suśravaṃ cāru madhuraṃ muktidaṃ param // Jss_1,2.68 //
GR14jnass01u:336: devalo vṛṣa-vāhaś ca mahā-mūḍhaś ca pātakī // Jss_1,2.69 //
GR14jnass01u:337: svapne jñāne na jānāti puṇyaṃ vā kṛṣṇa-pūjanam /
GR14jnass01u:340: tena puṇyena naivedyaṃ lebhe kṛṣṇasya brāhmaṇaḥ // Jss_1,2.71 //
GR14jnass01u:341: pituḥ puṇyena putraś ca mārge patitam alpakam /
GR14jnass01u:342: svayaṃ bhuktāvaśeṣaṃ ca patitaṃ vaiṣṇavāj janāt // Jss_1,2.72 //
GR14jnass01u:344: gacchatas tatra viprasya patitaṃ bhakṣya-vastu ca // Jss_1,2.73 //
GR14jnass01u:348: viprocchiṣṭaṃ ca bubhuje tasya patnī pati-vratā // Jss_1,2.75 //
GR14jnass01u:350: jīvan-mukto brāhmaṇaś ca babhūva sa saputrakaḥ // Jss_1,2.76 //
GR14jnass01u:351: kālena tena puṇyena vyāghra-bhuktaś ca kānane /
GR14jnass01u:352: sārdhaṃ ca vyāghra-putrābhyāṃ golokaṃ prayayau dvija /
GR14jnass01u:353: pati-vratā saha-mṛtā bhartā sārdhaṃ jagāma sā // Jss_1,2.77 //
GR14jnass01u:354: iti śrī-nārada-pañca-rātre jñānāmṛta-sāre prathamaika-rātre brahma-sanat-kumāra-saṃvāde naivedya-praśaṃsanaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
GR14jnass01u:357: aho tāta kim āścaryaṃ kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:358: paraṃ naivedya-māhātmyaṃ vistarād vada sāmpratam // Jss_1,3.1 //
GR14jnass01u:362: putreṇa sārdhaṃ prayayau bāndhavasya gṛhaṃ mudā // Jss_1,3.2 //
GR14jnass01u:364: bhuktvā pītvā ca tad-gṛhe sva-gṛhaṃ prayayau mudā // Jss_1,3.3 //
GR14jnass01u:366: dadarśa candra-bhāgāṃ tāṃ nadīm ati-manoharām // Jss_1,3.4 //
GR14jnass01u:367: uvāca putraḥ pitraṃ snātvā bhokṣyāmi ceti bhoḥ /
GR14jnass01u:368: kṣut-pipāsā balavatī vardhate tāta vartmani // Jss_1,3.5 //
GR14jnass01u:369: putrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tam uvāca dvijaḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:370: bhayaṃkaraṃ vanam idaṃ samīpe saritaḥ sutaḥ // Jss_1,3.6 //
GR14jnass01u:372: tatra snātvā ca bhokṣyāvo gaccha vatsa yathāsukham // Jss_1,3.7 //
GR14jnass01u:373: tātasya vacanaṃ śrutvā jahāsa ca cukopa ha /
GR14jnass01u:376: bālo 'haṃ daśa-varṣīyas tvaṃ ca vṛddhaś ca jñānadaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:377: pitā dadāti putrāya jñānaṃ sarvatra bhū-tale // Jss_1,3.9 //
GR14jnass01u:378: aho duratyayaḥ kālo vṛdhho vadati bālavat /
GR14jnass01u:379: kathaṃ prāktanam ullaṅghya brūhi tāta duratyayam // Jss_1,3.10 //
GR14jnass01u:380: prāktanāt sukha-duḥkhaṃ ca rogaṃ śokaṃ bhayaṃ pitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:381: sumṛtyur apamṛtyur vā cirāyur alpa-jīvanaḥ // Jss_1,3.11 //
GR14jnass01u:382: yatra kāle ca yan-mṛtyur bhavanaṃ śubha-karma ca /
GR14jnass01u:383: nyūnādhikaṃ kṣaṇaṃ nāsti niṣekaḥ kena vāryate // Jss_1,3.12 //
GR14jnass01u:384: yasya haste ca yan-mṛtyur vidhātrā likhitaḥ purā /
GR14jnass01u:385: na ca taṃ khaṇḍituṃ śaktaḥ svayaṃ viṣṇuś ca śaṅkaraḥ // Jss_1,3.13 //
GR14jnass01u:386: tāta vyartham adhītaṃ te durbuddher janma niṣphalam /
GR14jnass01u:387: subuddheḥ saphalaṃ janma tat-kṣaṇam jīvanaṃ sukham // Jss_1,3.14 //
GR14jnass01u:388: yena śuklī-kṛtā haṃsāḥ śukāś ca haritī-kṛtāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:389: mayūrāś citritā yena sa me rakṣāṃ kariṣyati // Jss_1,3.15 //
GR14jnass01u:390: yena kṛṣṇena viśvāni cāsaṃkhyāni kṛtāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:391: carācaraṃ ca yo rakṣet sa me rakṣāṃ kariṣyati // Jss_1,3.16 //
GR14jnass01u:392: ghorāraṇye sukhaṃ śete yo hi kṛṣṇena rakṣitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:393: nirbandho 'pi yasya maraṇaṃ tasya mandire // Jss_1,3.17 //
GR14jnass01u:395: yo nāga-bhakṣito bhogāt sa bhṛto garuḍāntike // Jss_1,3.18 //
GR14jnass01u:396: na samudre ca mriyate nāgni-rāśau viṣānale /
GR14jnass01u:397: na śastreṇa na cāstreṇāyur-marmāṇi rakṣati // Jss_1,3.19 //
GR14jnass01u:399: tṛṇāgreṇāpi saṃspṛṣṭaḥ prāpta-kālo na jīvati // Jss_1,3.20 //
GR14jnass01u:400: kaścid garbhe ca mriyate kaścid bhūmiṣṭa-mātrataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:401: kaścid yauvana-kāle ca kaścid eva hi vārddhake // Jss_1,3.21 //
GR14jnass01u:402: kaścid cirāyu rogī cāpy arogī cāpi kaścana /
GR14jnass01u:403: kaścid dhanī daridraś ca kaścid eva hi karmaṇā // Jss_1,3.22 //
GR14jnass01u:404: kaścit kalpānta-jīvī ca cira-jīvī ca kaścana /
GR14jnass01u:405: prāktanād amaraḥ kaścin niṣeko balavattaraḥ // Jss_1,3.23 //
GR14jnass01u:406: kaścid yāti ca rājendro divya-yānena karmaṇā /
GR14jnass01u:408: kaścid eva hi sannyāsī kaścic ca nara-ghātakaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:409: kaścid gajendra-gāmī ca paśu-yāyī ca kaścana // Jss_1,3.25 //
GR14jnass01u:410: kaścid sūkṣmāṃśukā-dhārī kaścij jīrṇa-paṭī janaḥ // Jss_1,3.26 //
GR14jnass01u:411: kaścin nagno 'apy anāhārī sudhā-bhojī ca ca kaścana /
GR14jnass01u:412: kaścic ca sundaraḥ śrīmān galat-kuṣṭī ca kaścana // Jss_1,3.27 //
GR14jnass01u:413: kaścit kubjaś cāṅga-hīno badhiraḥ kāṇa eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:414: kaścid dīrgho madhyamaś ca kaścit khañjaś ca vāmanaḥ // Jss_1,3.28 //
GR14jnass01u:415: kaścit kṛṣṇaś ca gauraś ca śyāmalaś ca sva-karmaṇā /
GR14jnass01u:416: kaścid bhaktyā ca prāpnoti kṛṣṇa-dāsyaṃ sudurlabham // Jss_1,3.29 //
GR14jnass01u:418: kaścit prāpnoti paramaṃ brahma-lokaṃ nirāmayam // Jss_1,3.30 //
GR14jnass01u:420: kaścit vargam indra-lokaṃ yama-lokaṃ ca kaścana // Jss_1,3.31 //
GR14jnass01u:421: kaścic ca narake ghore prāpnoti kleśam ulvaṇam /
GR14jnass01u:422: tādito yama-dūtena kṣudhitas tṛṣitaḥ sadā // Jss_1,3.32 //
GR14jnass01u:423: bhuṅkte viṇ-mūtra-kīṭaṃ tan-malaṃ śleṣmaṃ garaṃ vasām /
GR14jnass01u:424: kṣura-dhāre tapta-taile vahnau śite jale sthale // Jss_1,3.33 //
GR14jnass01u:425: prāpnoti dāruṇaṃ duḥkham ākalpaṃ pātakī pitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:426: tathā bhogāvaśeṣe ca labdhā janma sva-karmaṇā // Jss_1,3.34 //
GR14jnass01u:428: yad-bhayād vāti vāto 'yaṃ sūryas tapati yad-bhayāt // Jss_1,3.35 //
GR14jnass01u:429: varṣatīndro dahaty agnir mṛtyuś carati jantuṣu /
GR14jnass01u:430: yasyājñayā sṛṣṭi-vidhau mūrmo 'nantaṃ dadhāti ca // Jss_1,3.36 //
GR14jnass01u:431: sa ca sarvaṃ ca brahmāṇḍaṃ līlayā ceśvarecchayā /
GR14jnass01u:433: dharā sā sarvasyādyā ratnavāṃś ca himālayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:434: svayaṃ vidhātā bhagavān dhyāyate yam ahar-niśam // Jss_1,3.38 //
GR14jnass01u:435: yaṃ dhyāyate ca bhajate svayaṃ mṛtuñjayaḥ śivaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:436: sahasra-vaktro 'yaṃ stauti dhyāyate bhajate sadā // Jss_1,3.39 //
GR14jnass01u:437: svayṃ sarasvatī stauti yam īśvaram abhīpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:438: sevate pāda-padmaṃ ca svayaṃ padmālayā pitaḥ // Jss_1,3.40 //
GR14jnass01u:439: māyā bhītā ca yaṃ stauti durgā durgati-nāśinī /
GR14jnass01u:440: stuvanti vedāḥ satataṃ sāvitrī veda-mātṛkā // Jss_1,3.41 //
GR14jnass01u:441: siddhendrāś ca munīndrāś ca yogīndrāḥ sanakādayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:442: rājendrāś cāsurendrāś ca surendrā manavas tathā // Jss_1,3.42 //
GR14jnass01u:443: dhyāyante ca bhajante ca bhaktāḥ santo hi santatam /
GR14jnass01u:444: kecid vidanti yaṃ brahmāṃ bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,3.43 //
GR14jnass01u:445: kecit pradhānaṃ sarvādyaṃ kecic ca jyotir īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:446: kecic ca sarva-rūpaṃ ca sarva-kāraṇa-kāraṇam // Jss_1,3.44 //
GR14jnass01u:450: bhaja tāta paraṃ brahma smara śaśvat sureśvaram // Jss_1,3.46 //
GR14jnass01u:452: snātvā papau jalaṃ svacchaṃ bubhuje miṣṭa-modakam // Jss_1,3.47 //
GR14jnass01u:453: pitā tad-vacanaṃ śrutvā sānandāśru mumoca saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:455: pitā snātvā samārebhe sandhyāṃ kartuṃ ca pūjanam /
GR14jnass01u:456: susnātaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā putraḥ sa prayayau vanam // Jss_1,3.49 //
GR14jnass01u:458: cakāra cayanaṃ tūrṇaṃ praśastaṃ patra-pañcakam // Jss_1,3.50 //
GR14jnass01u:459: sundaraṃ kusumaṃ vanyaṃ pūjanārthaṃ pitus tathā /
GR14jnass01u:460: dadarśa purato bālaḥ supakvaṃ vadarī-phalam // Jss_1,3.51 //
GR14jnass01u:461: cakāra cayanaṃ tāni phalāni śobhanāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:462: dhātrī-phalaṃ supakvaṃ ca pakvam āmrātakaṃ tathā // Jss_1,3.52 //
GR14jnass01u:463: supakvaṃ ca kadambaṃ ca cakāra cayanaṃ punaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:464: supakvaṃ sundaraṃ ramyaṃ dāḍimaṃ śrī-phalaṃ tathā // Jss_1,3.53 //
GR14jnass01u:466: karañjakaṃ ca jāmbīraṃ sundaraṃ cikuraṃ tathā // Jss_1,3.54 //
GR14jnass01u:467: tat sarvaṃ cayanaṃ kṛtvā dadarśa purataḥ saraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:468: sunirmalaṃ jalaṃ svacchaṃ śveta-padmaṃ manoharam // Jss_1,3.55 //
GR14jnass01u:470: vihāya tāni sarvāṇi saraḥ-śirasi susthale // Jss_1,3.56 //
GR14jnass01u:472: kiṃcit surakta-kahlāraṃ pakvaṃ padma-phalaṃ tathā // Jss_1,3.57 //
GR14jnass01u:473: sarvam āharaṇaṃ kṛtvā pitaraṃ gantum udyataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:477: cakāra cayanaṃ sphītaḥ puṣpāṇi sundarāṇi ca /
GR14jnass01u:478: puṣpeṇa phala-patreṇa tasya bhāro babhūva ha // Jss_1,3.60 //
GR14jnass01u:479: bālo voḍhum aśakyantaś ca yayau gamana-mantharaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:480: na phalaṃ bubhuje so 'pi dharmādharma-bhayena ca // Jss_1,3.61 //
GR14jnass01u:481: puro dadarśa sa śiśur ghoraṃ vyāghrālayaṃ bhiyā /
GR14jnass01u:482: tāta tāteti śabdaṃ ca cakāra ha punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,3.62 //
GR14jnass01u:483: na dadarśa ca tātaṃ ca śārdulaṃ ca dadarśa saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:485: hariṃ nara-hariṃ rāmaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ ca mādhvam /
GR14jnass01u:487: etāni daśa nāmāni japan vipra-śiśur bhiyā /
GR14jnass01u:488: prayayau purataḥ śīghraṃ punar eva sarovaram // Jss_1,3.65 //
GR14jnass01u:489: saraso nirmale tīre puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:490: dadau bhaktyā bhagavate kṛṣṇāya paramātmane // Jss_1,3.66 //
GR14jnass01u:492: nikaṭaṃ na yayau vyāghro dṛṣṭvā bālaṃ ca dūrataḥ // Jss_1,3.67 //
GR14jnass01u:493: vyāghraṃ dadarśa bālaś ca prakaṭāsyaṃ bhayānakam /
GR14jnass01u:495: dṛṣṭvā ca durato vyāghram uvāsa sarasas taṭe /
GR14jnass01u:498: viśuddhaṃ ca tathājñākhyaṃ ṣaṭ-cakraṃ ca vibhāvya ca // Jss_1,3.70 //
GR14jnass01u:518: nirliptaṃ sākṣi-bhūtaṃ ca bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,3.80 //
GR14jnass01u:520: puruṣaṃ paramātmaikaṃ pareśaṃ prakṛteḥ paraṃ // Jss_1,3.81 //
GR14jnass01u:521: evaṃ bhūtaṃ vibhuṃ dṛṣṭvā manasā praṇanāma tam /
GR14jnass01u:522: tuṣṭāva parayā bhaktyā tam īśaṃ sampuṭāñjaliḥ // Jss_1,3.82 //
GR14jnass01u:524: he nātha darśnaṃ dehi māṃ bhaktaṃ śaraṇāgatam /
GR14jnass01u:525: śrīda śrīśa śrī-nivāsa śrī-nidhe śrī-niketana // Jss_1,3.83 //
GR14jnass01u:532: ity evam uktvā sa śiśu ruroda ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:533: dhyāyena tat-padāmbhojaṃ śaraṇaṃ ca cakāra saḥ // Jss_1,3.87 //
GR14jnass01u:534: iti viprakṛtaṃ stotraṃ tri-sandhyaṃ yaḥ paṭhen naraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:535: mucyate sarva-pāpebhyo viṣṇu-lokaṃ sa gacchati // Jss_1,3.88 //
GR14jnass01u:536: iti śrī-nārada-pañca-rātre jñānāmṛta-sāre prathamaika-rātre brahma-sanat-kumāra-saṃvāde śrī-kṛṣṇa-mahimopālambhanaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
GR14jnass01u:540: kṛpāṃ cakāra bhagavān bhakteśo bhakta-vatsalaḥ // Jss_1,4.1 //
GR14jnass01u:550: śubhāśiṣaṃ dadau tasmai datvā śirasi hastakam // Jss_1,4.6 //
GR14jnass01u:554: aye vipra mahā-bhāga saphalaṃ jīvanaṃ tava /
GR14jnass01u:555: yasmin kule ca jāto 'si tad-dhanyaṃ supraśaṃsitam // Jss_1,4.8 //
GR14jnass01u:557: dhruvaṃ yāsyasi golokaṃ paramānandam īpsitam // Jss_1,4.9 //
GR14jnass01u:558: tat kulaṃ pāvanaṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca nirāpadam /
GR14jnass01u:559: yasmin svayaṃ bhavān jātaḥ puṇyaḥ kṛṣṇa-parāyaṇaḥ // Jss_1,4.10 //
GR14jnass01u:561: bhuktvā tavaiṣā buddhiś ca kṛṣṇa-bhaktir babhūva ca // Jss_1,4.11 //
GR14jnass01u:563: yad vaktuṃ na hi śaktāś ca vedāś catvāra eva ca // Jss_1,4.12 //
GR14jnass01u:564: varaṃ vṛṇuṣva bhadraṃ te subhadra dvija-puṅgava /
GR14jnass01u:565: sarvaṃ dātum ahaṃ śakto yat te manasi vāñcchitam // Jss_1,4.13 //
GR14jnass01u:566: nārāyaṇa-vacaḥ śrutvā tam uvāca śiṣuḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:569: dehi me kṛṣṇa-pādābje dṛḍhaṃ bhaktiṃ sudurlabham /
GR14jnass01u:570: tad-dāsyaṃ tat-pade vāsaṃ jarā-mṛtyu-haraṃ param // Jss_1,4.15 //
GR14jnass01u:571: anyaṃ varaṃ na gṛhṇāmi na me kiṃcit prayojanam /
GR14jnass01u:572: nāhaṃ varārthī kāmī ca rāgī vetana-bhug yathā // Jss_1,4.16 //
GR14jnass01u:574: śrī-kṛṣṇo yasya bhaktiś ca tasyātra kiṃ sudurlabham /
GR14jnass01u:576: nirvikalpo dadāty asya naiva gṛhṇāti vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:577: animittāṃ harer bhaktiṃ bhaktā vāñcchanti santatam // Jss_1,4.18 //
GR14jnass01u:578: gṛhāṇa mantraṃ kṛṣṇasya paraṃ kalpa-taruṃ varam /
GR14jnass01u:582: ity evam uktvā tat-karṇe kathayām āsa dakṣiṇe /
GR14jnass01u:585: ājñāṃ cakāra sa ṛṣis tad eva paṭhituṃ mudā // Jss_1,4.22 //
GR14jnass01u:588: harer dāsyaṃ ca tad-bhaktir goloka-vāsam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:591: satyaṃ kuru mahā-bhāga varaṃ me yadi dāsyasi /
GR14jnass01u:592: varaṃ vṛṇomi tat paścāt yan me manasi vāñcchitam // Jss_1,4.25 //
GR14jnass01u:594: oṃ satyaṃ vatsa dāsyāmi varaṃ vṛṇu yathepsitam /
GR14jnass01u:595: mamāśakyaṃ nāsti kiṃcit dātāhaṃ sarva-sampadām // Jss_1,4.26 //
GR14jnass01u:597: kaṇṭhe te kiṃ ca kavacaṃ kasya vā sarva-pūjitam /
GR14jnass01u:599: kavacaṃ dehi me deva sva-satya-rakṣaṇaṃ kuru /
GR14jnass01u:601: vaktuṃ na śaktas tad vākyaṃ dadhyau kṛṣṇa-padāmbujam /
GR14jnass01u:602: pradadau guṭikāṃ tasmai novāca kavacaṃ muniḥ // Jss_1,4.29 //
GR14jnass01u:603: tam uvāca maharṣiś ca vituṣṭaś conmanāḥ suta /
GR14jnass01u:604: vatsa krodho hi devasya varaṃ tulyaṃ ca vāñcchitam // Jss_1,4.30 //
GR14jnass01u:607: labhasva durlabhāṃ lakṣmīṃ māyayā mohito bhava // Jss_1,4.31 //
GR14jnass01u:611: pare mṛkaṇḍu-putras tvaṃ mārkaṇḍeyo bhaviṣyasi // Jss_1,4.33 //
GR14jnass01u:612: mayā dattaṃ ca kavacaṃ tvāṃ ca rakṣati putraka /
GR14jnass01u:613: tava kaṇṭhe sthitiś cāśya prati janmani janmani // Jss_1,4.34 //
GR14jnass01u:614: punaś ca guṭikā-yuktaṃ kṛtvā ca kavacaṃ muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:615: gale dadhāra bhaktyā ca tad-bhakto dharma-nandanaḥ // Jss_1,4.35 //
GR14jnass01u:616: varaṃ datvā ca sa munir yayau gehaṃ sa unmanāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:617: viprāya kavacaṃ datvā naṣṭa-vatsā gaur yathā // Jss_1,4.36 //
GR14jnass01u:618: bhrātrā nareṇa pitrā ca dharmeṇa ca mahātmanā /
GR14jnass01u:619: mātrā mūrtyā ca patnyā ca śāntyā ca bhartsito muniḥ // Jss_1,4.37 //
GR14jnass01u:620: vipraḥ samprāpya kavacaṃ mantraṃ kalpa-taruṃ param /
GR14jnass01u:623: jajāpa paramaṃ mantraṃ sampūjya jagad-īśvaram // Jss_1,4.39 //
GR14jnass01u:624: atha tat-tāta-vipro hi samanviṣya sutaṃ ciram /
GR14jnass01u:625: gatvā ca sva-gṛhaṃ duḥkhī śokārtaḥ sa ruroda ca // Jss_1,4.40 //
GR14jnass01u:627: na tatyāja tanuṃ vipro dṛṣṭvā susvapnam uttamam // Jss_1,4.41 //
GR14jnass01u:629: prayayau kānanaṃ ghoraṃ sarvaiś ca bāndhavaiḥ sahaḥ // Jss_1,4.42 //
GR14jnass01u:630: sarvaṃ vanaṃ samanviṣya prayayus te sarovaram /
GR14jnass01u:631: dadṛśus te śiśuṃ gṛhyaṃ sūryābhaṃ vaṭa-mūlake // Jss_1,4.43 //
GR14jnass01u:632: cucumba gaṇḍaṃ putrasya vipro viprā ca sāradam /
GR14jnass01u:633: āśiśleṣa krameṇaiva mātā tātaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,4.44 //
GR14jnass01u:634: putraś ca sarva-vṛttāntaṃ kathayām āsa sādaram /
GR14jnass01u:635: śrutvā putrasya vipraś ca viprā bāndhavas tathā // Jss_1,4. 45 //
GR14jnass01u:637: candra-bhāgāṃ samuttīrya viveśa nagaraṃ param // Jss_1,4.46 //
GR14jnass01u:638: nagara-stho nṛpendraś ca dṛṣṭvā tejasvinaṃ śiśum /
GR14jnass01u:639: dadau tasmai sva-kanyāṃ ca ratnālaṅkāra-bhūṣitam // Jss_1,4.47 //
GR14jnass01u:642: gajendrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ ca pradadau yautukaṃ mudā /
GR14jnass01u:643: aśvānāṃ daśa-lakṣaṃ ca ratnānāṃ ca sahasrakam // Jss_1,4.49 //
GR14jnass01u:646: dāsānāṃ ca sahasraṃ ca padātīnāṃ tri-lakṣakam /
GR14jnass01u:647: daśa-lakṣaṃ suvarṇaṃ ca ratna-mālāṃ sudurlabhām // Jss_1,4.51 //
GR14jnass01u:648: datvā tasmai ca kanyāṃ ca ruroda ca sabhāryakaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:649: rājā ca kanyayā sārdhaṃ prayayau vipra-mandiram // Jss_1,4.52 //
GR14jnass01u:650: gatvā cāpi kiyad dūraṃ dadarśa nagaraṃ nṛpaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:651: atīva sundaraṃ ramyaṃ vijitya cāmarāvatīm // Jss_1,4.53 //
GR14jnass01u:655: durlaṅghyam ati-durgamyaṃ ripūṇām api putraka // Jss_1,4.55 //
GR14jnass01u:661: prākāraṃ maṇi-bhūṣāḍhyam uccair ākāśa-sparśi ca // Jss_1,4.58 //
GR14jnass01u:662: jagāma vismayaṃ rājā dṛṣṭvā nagaram uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:663: pitrā mātrā saha śiśur vismayaṃ ca yayau mudā // Jss_1,4.59 //
GR14jnass01u:665: catur-guṇaṃ padātīnām āyayus te 'py anuvrajam // Jss_1,4.60 //
GR14jnass01u:666: vāraṇendraṃ puras kṛtya veśyāṃ ca nartakaṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:667: dvijāṃś ca pūrṇa-kumbhāṃś ca pati-putravatīṃ satīṃ // Jss_1,4.61 //
GR14jnass01u:669: mūrdhnā nanāma vegenāpy avaruhya gajād api // Jss_1,4.62 //
GR14jnass01u:671: ratna-siṃhāsanaṃ tasmai pradadau sādaraṃ mudā // Jss_1,4.63 //
GR14jnass01u:672: kanyā-dātre ca pitre ca mātre ca sādaraṃ mudā /
GR14jnass01u:673: ratna-siṃḥāsanaṃ ramyaṃ pradadau pātra eva ca // Jss_1,4.64 //
GR14jnass01u:674: śiśum siṣeva pātraś ca svayaṃ ca śveta-cāmaraiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:676: uvāsa sa sa-bhāryāṃ ca sudharmyāṃ mahendravat /
GR14jnass01u:677: śvasuraś ca yayau gehaṃ śiśunā ca puraskṛtaḥ // Jss_1,4.66 //
GR14jnass01u:678: triṃśat-sahasra-varṣaṃ ca rājā rājyaṃ cakāra saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:679: kālāntare tat-pitā ca vane vyāghreṇa bhakṣitaḥ // Jss_1,4.67 //
GR14jnass01u:683: tad-asthi bhuktvā vyāghraś ca pūtaḥ sadyaś ca sāṃpratam // Jss_1,4.69 //
GR14jnass01u:684: tābhyāṃ sārdhaṃ ca prayayau golokaṃ sumanoharam /
GR14jnass01u:685: śiśur dehaṃ parityajya himādrau svar-ṇadī-taṭe // Jss_1,4.70 //
GR14jnass01u:686: datvā putrāya rājyaṃ ca svargād api sudurlabham /
GR14jnass01u:687: mṛkaṇḍu-patnī-garbhe ca lebhe janma sva-karmaṇā // Jss_1,4.71 //
GR14jnass01u:691: śva-bhakṣitaṃ ca naivedyaṃ bhuktvā ced īdṛśī gatiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:692: akāmataś cāpy ajñāto jīrṇa-mārga-sthitaṃ suta // Jss_1,4.73 //
GR14jnass01u:693: yo bhakṣet kāmato jñāto nityaṃ naivedyam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:694: na jānanti gatis tasya vedāś catvāra eva ca // Jss_1,4.74 //
GR14jnass01u:695: iti te kathitaṃ brahmann itihāsaṃ purātanam /
GR14jnass01u:696: āścaryaṃ madhuraṃ ramyaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi // Jss_1,4.75 //
GR14jnass01u:699: īśvarasyāpi he tāta kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,4.76 //
GR14jnass01u:701: nārāyaṇarṣer kaṇṭhe ca kavacaṃ tasya tad vada // Jss_1,4.77 //
GR14jnass01u:705: kasya tat kavacaṃ brahmann idaṃ vaktuṃ tvam arhasi // Jss_1,4.78 //
GR14jnass01u:706: sa pitā sa guruḥ svacchaḥ karoti bhrama-bhañjanam /
GR14jnass01u:707: śīghraṃ brūhi mahā-bhāga nāradaṃ māṃ suta-priya // Jss_1,4.79 //
GR14jnass01u:709: uvāca vacanaṃ brahmā smaran kṛṣṇa-padāmbujam // Jss_1,4.80 //
GR14jnass01u:712: viprāya kavacaṃ dattam dhyānaṃ ca parmātmanaḥ // Jss_1,4.81 //
GR14jnass01u:713: tad bravīmi mahā-bhāga tvām eva nāradaṃ prati /
GR14jnass01u:714: kaṇṭha-sthaṃ kavacaṃ vaktuṃ naiva śaknomi sāṃpratam // Jss_1,4.82 //
GR14jnass01u:716: nārāyaṇarṣi-kaṇṭhe ca tad eva paramādbhutam // Jss_1,4.83 //
GR14jnass01u:717: tad eva dharma-kaṇṭhe ca narasya ca mahātmanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:718: agastyasya ca kaṇṭhe ca lomaśasya mahā-muneḥ // Jss_1,4.84 //
GR14jnass01u:719: tulasyāś cāpi saṃjñāyāḥ sāvitryāś cāpi putraka /
GR14jnass01u:720: anyeṣāṃ ca bhāgyavatāṃ bhārate ca sudurlabhe // Jss_1,4.85 //
GR14jnass01u:723: dhyānaṃ pūjāṃ vidhānaṃ ca kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,4.86 //
GR14jnass01u:724: ādau kathaya bhadraṃ te paraṃ parama-bhadrakam /
GR14jnass01u:725: subhadra-prāptaṃ kavacaṃ māhātmyaṃ yasya durlabham // Jss_1,4.87 //
GR14jnass01u:728: śaṅkarasya mukhād vipra sva-guror jñāninas tathā // Jss_1,4.88 //
GR14jnass01u:733: tavecchā yatra kavace dhyāne tad vada sāmpratam /
GR14jnass01u:734: yac chṛṇomi śubhaṃ tac ca kena śreyasi tṛpyate // Jss_1,5.1 //
GR14jnass01u:737: kavacaṃ ca subhadrāya dharmiṣṭhāya mahātmane // Jss_1,5.2 //
GR14jnass01u:743: sarvādyaṃ sarva-jñaṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,5.5 //
GR14jnass01u:744: nirguṇaṃ ca nirīhaṃ ca nirliptam īsvaraṃ bhaje /
GR14jnass01u:745: dhyātvā mūlena tasmai ca dadyāt pādyādikaṃ mudā // Jss_1,5.6 //
GR14jnass01u:746: tataḥ stotraṃ ca kavacaṃ bhaktyā ca prapaṭhen naraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:747: japtvā ca mantraṃ bhaktyā daṇḍavat praṇamed bhuvi /
GR14jnass01u:748: iti te kathitaṃ vatsa kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi // Jss_1,5.7 //
GR14jnass01u:751: pūjyaṃ puṇya-svarūpaṃ ca kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,5.8 //
GR14jnass01u:755: śrī-kṛṣṇenaiva kathitaṃ mahyaṃ ca kṛpayā parā // Jss_1,5.9 //
GR14jnass01u:756: mayā dattaṃ ca dharmāya tena nārāyaṇarṣaye /
GR14jnass01u:757: ṛṣiṇā tena tad dattaṃ subhadrāya mahātmane // Jss_1,5.10 //
GR14jnass01u:758: ati-guhyatamaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ snehād vadāmy aham /
GR14jnass01u:759: yad dhṛtvā paṭhanāt siddhāḥ siddhāni prāpnuvanti ca // Jss_1,5.11 //
GR14jnass01u:761: ṛṣiś chandaś ca sāvitrī devo nārāyaṇaḥ svayam // Jss_1,5.12 //
GR14jnass01u:763: rādheśo me śiraḥ pātu kaṇṭhaṃ radheśvaraḥ // Jss_1,5.13 //
GR14jnass01u:764: gopīśaś cakṣuṣī pātu tālu ca bhagavān svayam /
GR14jnass01u:765: gaṇḍa-yugmaṃ ca govindaḥ karṇa-yugmaṃ ca keśavaḥ // Jss_1,5.14 //
GR14jnass01u:766: galaṃ gadādharaḥ pātu skandhaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GR14jnass01u:767: vakṣa-sthalaṃ vāsudevaś codaraṃ cāpi so 'cyutaḥ // Jss_1,5.15 //
GR14jnass01u:769: puruṣottamaḥ pātu pṛṣṭhaṃ nityānando nitambakam // Jss_1,5.16 //
GR14jnass01u:771: nāsāṃ ca nakharaṃ pātu narasiṃhaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ // Jss_1,5.17 //
GR14jnass01u:773: prācyāṃ pātu ca rāmaś ca vahnau ca vaṃśī-dharaḥ svayam // Jss_1,5.18 //
GR14jnass01u:774: pātu dāmodaro dakṣe nairṛte ca narottmaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:775: paścime puṇḍarīkākṣo vāyavyāṃ vāmanaḥ svayam // Jss_1,5.19 //
GR14jnass01u:776: anantaś cottare pātu aiśānyām īśvaraḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:777: jale sthale cāntarīkṣe svapne jāgaraṇe tathā // Jss_1,5.20 //
GR14jnass01u:778: pātu vṛndāvaneśaś ca māṃ bhaktaṃ śaraṇāgatam /
GR14jnass01u:779: iti te kathitaṃ vatsa kavacaṃ paramādbhutam // Jss_1,5.21 //
GR14jnass01u:781: idaṃ kavacam iṣṭaṃ ca pūjā-kāle ca yaḥ paṭhet // Jss_1,5.22 //
GR14jnass01u:783: ihaiva hari-bhaktiṃ ca jīvan-mukto bhaven naraḥ // Jss_1,5.23 //
GR14jnass01u:786: subhadrāya brāhmaṇāya tan me vaktum ihārhasi // Jss_1,5.24 //
GR14jnass01u:788: mad-iṣṭa-devyāḥ kavacaṃ kathaṃ tat kathayāmi te /
GR14jnass01u:791: tathāpīdaṃ na kathitaṃ niṣiddhaṃ hariṇā smṛtam // Jss_1,5.26 //
GR14jnass01u:792: tasyarṣeś ceṣṭa-devyāś ca noktaṃ tenedam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:793: mahyaṃ na dattā guṭikā bāndhavair bhartsitena ca // Jss_1,5.27 //
GR14jnass01u:794: ātmanaḥ kavacaṃ mantraṃ svayaṃ dātuṃ na cārhati /
GR14jnass01u:795: prāṇā naṣṭāś ca dānena ceti veda-vido viduḥ // Jss_1,5.28 //
GR14jnass01u:797: sa eva tubhyaṃ kavacaṃ dāsyasy eva na saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,5.29 //
GR14jnass01u:799: dhruvaṃ prāpsyasi tvaṃ vatsa kavacaṃ tat sudurlabham // Jss_1,5.30 //
GR14jnass01u:800: kumāra gaccha vaikuṇṭhaṃ sva-guruṃ paśya sat-varam /
GR14jnass01u:801: nārāyaṇaś ca kavacaṃ tubhyaṃ dāsyasi niścitam // Jss_1,5.31 //
GR14jnass01u:803: saṃprāpya kavacaṃ vatsa kavacaṃ tat sudurlabham // Jss_1,5.32 //
GR14jnass01u:804: ājñayā brahmaṇaś cāpi nārado gantum udyataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:810: gate brahman kiṃ cakāra bhagavān nārado muniḥ // Jss_1,6.1 //
GR14jnass01u:812: munis tayoś ca gatayoḥ sa ruroda sarit-taṭe /
GR14jnass01u:813: itas tataś ca babhrāma mad-viyoga-śucāspada // Jss_1,6.2 //
GR14jnass01u:815: dhyāyamāno hari-padaṃ śivaṃ draṣṭuṃ samutsukaḥ // Jss_1,6.3 //
GR14jnass01u:816: praṇamya pitaraṃ bhaktyā kumāraṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:819: bhuktvā phalaṃ jalaṃ pītvā prayayau gandha-mādanam // Jss_1,6.5 //
GR14jnass01u:827: śivasya śiṣyaṃ sad-bhaktaṃ yogīndrāṇāṃ guror guroḥ // Jss_1,6.9 //
GR14jnass01u:834: itas tataś ca babhrāma dadarśa svāśramaṃ muneḥ /
GR14jnass01u:835: atīva surahaḥ-sthānaṃ ramyaṃ ramyaṃ navaṃ navam // Jss_1,6.13 //
GR14jnass01u:836: susnigdhaṃ sundaraṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ svacchaṃ sarovaram /
GR14jnass01u:841: vyākulaiḥ saṃkulaiḥ śaśvad-rājitaiś ca virājitam // Jss_1,6.15 //
GR14jnass01u:843: karañjakaiś ca karajair bimbaiḥ śākhoṭikais tathā // Jss_1,6.16 //
GR14jnass01u:845: mandāraiḥ sindhu-vāraiś ca tāḍi-patraiḥ suśobhanaiḥ // Jss_1,6.17 //
GR14jnass01u:846: guvākair nāriketaiś ca kharjuraiḥ panasais tathā /
GR14jnass01u:847: tālaiḥ śālaiḥ piyālaiś ca hintālair vakulair api // Jss_1,6.18 //
GR14jnass01u:848: āmrair āmrātakaiś caiva jambīrair dāḍimais tathā /
GR14jnass01u:849: śrī-phalair vadarībhiś ca jambubhir nāgaraṅgakaiḥ // Jss_1,6.19 //
GR14jnass01u:851: taruṇais taru-rājais ca nānā-jātibhir īpsitam // Jss_1,6.20 //
GR14jnass01u:854: kadambānāṃ kadambaiś ca svacchaiḥ śvetaiś ca puṣpitaiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:855: nāgeśvarāṇāṃ vṛndaiś ca dīptaṃ mandārakair varaiḥ // Jss_1,6.22 //
GR14jnass01u:857: santataṃ kūjitaṃ śuddhaṃ suvyaktaṃ sumanoharam // Jss_1,6.23 //
GR14jnass01u:858: śārdūlaiḥ śarabhaiḥ siṃhair gaṇḍakair mahiṣaiḥ param /
GR14jnass01u:863: siddha-sthalaṃ siddhidaṃ taṃ mantra-siddhi-karaṃ paraṃ // Jss_1,6.26 //
GR14jnass01u:865: āsane ca samāsīnaṃ dhyāna-hīnaṃ dadarśa tam // Jss_1,6.27 //
GR14jnass01u:867: datvāmalaṃ phalaṃ mūlaṃ saṃbhāṣāṃ sa cakāra ha // Jss_1,6.28 //
GR14jnass01u:871: atithiṃ brāhmaṇa-varaṃ brahma-putraṃ ca pūjitaṃ // Jss_1,6.30 //
GR14jnass01u:873: kiṃ nāma bhavato vipra kva yāsīti kva cāgataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:874: kva te pitā sa ko vāpi kva vāsaḥ kutra saṃbhavaḥ // Jss_1,6.31 //
GR14jnass01u:875: māṃ vā mamāśramaṃ vāpi pūtaṃ kartum ihāgataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:876: mūrtimad-brahma-tejo hi mama bhāgyād upasthitaḥ // Jss_1,6.32 //
GR14jnass01u:878: na hy ammayāni tīrthāni na devā mṛcchitāmayāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:879: te punanty urukālena vaiṣṇavo darśanena ca // Jss_1,6.33 //
GR14jnass01u:880: sadyaḥ pūtāni tīrthāni sadyaḥ pūtā sa-sāgarā /
GR14jnass01u:884: pūjito vaiṣṇavo yena viśvaṃ ca tena pūjitam /
GR14jnass01u:885: āśramaṃ vastu-sahitaṃ sarvaṃ tubhyaṃ niveditam // Jss_1,6.36 //
GR14jnass01u:886: phalāni ca supakvāni bhuṅkṣva bhogāni sāmpratam /
GR14jnass01u:887: suvāsitam piba svādu śītalaṃ nirmalaṃ jalam // Jss_1,6.37 //
GR14jnass01u:888: dugdhaṃ ca surabhī-dattaṃ ramyaṃ madhuritaṃ madhu /
GR14jnass01u:889: paripakvaṃ phala-rasaṃ piba svādu muhur muhuḥ // Jss_1,6.38 //
GR14jnass01u:890: sukha-bījye sutalpe ca śayanaṃ kuru sundare /
GR14jnass01u:893: atithir yasya puṣṭo hi tasya puṣṭo hariḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:894: harau tuṣṭe gurus tuṣṭo gurau tuṣṭe jagat-trayam // Jss_1,6.40 //
GR14jnass01u:896: tīrthāny etāni sarvāṇi puṇyāni ca vratāni ca // Jss_1,6.41 //
GR14jnass01u:897: tapāṃsi yajñāḥ satyaṃ ca śīlaṃ dharmaḥ sukarma ca /
GR14jnass01u:898: apūjitair atithibhir sārdhaṃ sarve prayānti te // Jss_1,6.42 //
GR14jnass01u:901: pitaras tasya devāś ca puṇyaṃ dharma-vratāśanāḥ // Jss_1,6.43 //
GR14jnass01u:902: yamaḥ pratiṣṭhā lakṣmīś cābhīṣṭa-devo gurus tathā /
GR14jnass01u:903: nirāśāḥ pratigacchanti tyaktvā pāpaṃ ca pūruṣam // Jss_1,6.44 //
GR14jnass01u:904: strī-ghnaiś caiva kṛta-ghnaiś ca brahma-ghnair guru-talpa-gaiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:905: viśvāsa-ghātibhir duṣṭair mitra-drohibhir eva ca // Jss_1,6.45 //
GR14jnass01u:906: satya-ghnaiś ca kṛta-ghnaiś ca pāpibhiḥ sthāpibhis tathā /
GR14jnass01u:918: tulyo bhavati viprendrātithir eva tv anarcitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:919: itya evam uktvā muniḥ pūjayām āsa nāradam /
GR14jnass01u:920: miṣṭaṃ ca bhojayām āsa śāyayām āsa bhaktitaḥ // Jss_1,6.52 //
GR14jnass01u:923: tapaḥ-sthalād āgato 'haṃ yāmi kailāsam īpsitam // Jss_1,6.53 //
GR14jnass01u:924: ātmānaṃ pāvanaṃ kartuṃ tvāṃ ca draṣṭum ihāgataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:926: ko bhavān dhyāna-pūtaś ca nagnaś ca kaṭa-mastakaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:927: kiṃ dhyāyase mahā-bhāga śreṣṭha-devaś ca ko guruh // Jss_1,6.55 //
GR14jnass01u:930: yasya tatra kule janma tasya tat-tad-vacomanaḥ // Jss_1,6.56 //
GR14jnass01u:931: putre yaśasi toye ca kavitvena ca vidyayā /
GR14jnass01u:932: pratiśhṭhāyāṃ ca jñāyeta sarveṣāṃ mānasaṃ nṛṇām // Jss_1,6.57 //
GR14jnass01u:936: nagno'lpāyur vivekī ca vāsasā kiṃ prayojanam // Jss_1,6.59 //
GR14jnass01u:937: vṛkṣa-mūle nivāse me chatreṇa kiṃ gṛheṇa ca /
GR14jnass01u:941: kiṃ kalatreṇa putreṇa dhanena saṃpadā śriyā /
GR14jnass01u:942: kiṃ vittena ca rūpeṇa jīvanālpāyuṣā mune // Jss_1,6.62 //
GR14jnass01u:944: manoś ca patanaṃ tatra māyayā kiṃ prayojanam // Jss_1,6.63 //
GR14jnass01u:946: alpāyuṣo mama mune maraṇaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet // Jss_1,6.64 //
GR14jnass01u:948: parasya prakṛtes tasya kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,6.65 //
GR14jnass01u:950: gurur me jagatāṃ nātho yogīndrāṇāṃ guruḥ śivaḥ // Jss_1,6.66 //
GR14jnass01u:952: guror niṣedho yatrāste tad vaktuṃ kaḥ kṣamo bhuvi // Jss_1,6.67 //
GR14jnass01u:953: guroś ca vacanaṃ yo hi pālanaṃ na karoti ca /
GR14jnass01u:954: gurūktam uktvā pāpī sa brahma-hatyāṃ labhed dhruvam // Jss_1,6.68 //
GR14jnass01u:955: sva-guruṃ śiva-rūpaṃ ca tad-bhinnaṃ manyate hi yaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:956: brahma-hatyāṃ labhet so 'pi vighnas tasya pade pade // Jss_1,6.69 //
GR14jnass01u:957: akartavyaṃ tu kartavyaṃ pālanīyaṃ guror vacaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:958: apālane sarva-vighnaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,6.70 //
GR14jnass01u:960: mucyate sarva-pāpebhyo jīvan-mukto bhaven naraḥ // Jss_1,6.71 //
GR14jnass01u:961: sva-guruṃ śaṅkaraṃ paśya gaccha kailāsam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:966: saṃbhāṣya lomaśaṃ tasmāj jagāma nārado muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:974: sa munir nāradaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaktyā ca praṇanāma ca /
GR14jnass01u:975: papraccha kuśalaṃ śāntaṃ śāntaḥ sattva-guṇāśrayaḥ // Jss_1,7.5 //
GR14jnass01u:977: adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvanaṃ cātisārthakam /
GR14jnass01u:978: mamāśrame puṇya-rāśir brahma-putraś ca nāradaḥ // Jss_1,7.6 //
GR14jnass01u:980: kva yāsi kuta āyāsi kiṃ te manasi vartate // Jss_1,7.7 //
GR14jnass01u:982: manonurūpaṃ vākyaṃ ca vākyena prasphuṭaṃ manaḥ // Jss_1,7.8 //
GR14jnass01u:983: muneś ca vacanaṃ śrutvā vīṇā-pāṇi svam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:984: uvāca sasmitaṃ śāntaṃ vacaḥ satyaṃ sudhopamam // Jss_1,7.9 //
GR14jnass01u:986: he bandho yāmi kailāsaṃ jñānārthaṃ jñānināṃ varam /
GR14jnass01u:987: draṣṭuṃ mahā-devaṃ ca praṇāmaṃ kartum īśvaram // Jss_1,7.10 //
GR14jnass01u:988: pūjāṃ gṛhītvā cety uktvā prayayau nārado muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:989: mārkaṇḍeyaś ca śokārtaḥ sadvicchedaḥ sudāruṇaḥ // Jss_1,7.11 //
GR14jnass01u:990: himālayaṃ ca durlaghyaṃ vilaghyaṃ caiva līlayā /
GR14jnass01u:995: siddhendraiś ca munīndraiś yogīndraiḥ pariśobhitam // Jss_1,7.14 //
GR14jnass01u:996: praṇatāṃs tāṃś ca saṃbhāṣya pārvatī-kānanaṃ yayau /
GR14jnass01u:998: śobhitaṃ sundarai ramyaiḥ saptabhiś ca sarovaraiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1001: puṣpodyānaiś ca śatakaiḥ puṣpitaiḥ sumanoharaiḥ // Jss_1,7.17 //
GR14jnass01u:1005: viṣṇu-krāntā ca tulasī śophalī saptalā tathā // Jss_1,7.19 //
GR14jnass01u:1008: kharjūraiś ca guvākaiś ca palāsair jambubhis tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1009: dāḍimbaiś cāpi jambīrair nimbaiś caiva vaṭais tathā // Jss_1,7.21 //
GR14jnass01u:1011: kadambānāṃ kadambaiś ca tintiṇḍīnāṃ kadambakaiḥ // Jss_1,7.22 //
GR14jnass01u:1014: picchilaiḥ parṇa-śālaiś ca gambhāribhiś ca valgukaiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1015: hiṅgulair añjanair valkair bhūrja-patraiḥ sapatrakaiḥ // Jss_1,7.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1016: anyaiś ca durlabhair vanyaiḥ puṣpa-patrair virājitam /
GR14jnass01u:1019: anyaiś ca durlabhair vanyaiḥ puṣpa-patrair vibhūṣitam // Jss_1,7.26 //
GR14jnass01u:1021: śārdūlendraiś ca mahiṣair aśvaiś ca vanya-śūkaraiḥ // Jss_1,7.27 //
GR14jnass01u:1022: śallakair ballakair markaiḥ kūṭaiś ca śaśakaiḥ śakaiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1031: parasparaṃ ca suprītaṃ hiṃsrāṇāṃ kṣudra-jantubhiḥ // Jss_1,7.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1033: munīndrair indra-nīlaiś ca padma-rāgaiḥ pariṣkṛtam // Jss_1,7.33 //
GR14jnass01u:1039: paritaḥ paritaḥ śaśvan mālājālair vibhūṣitam // Jss_1,7.36 //
GR14jnass01u:1043: mārjitaṃ citritaṃ citraiḥ parito raṅga-vastubhiḥ // Jss_1,7.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1044: dṛṣṭvā tad adbhutaṃ śīghraṃ prayayau svar-ṇadīṃ muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1048: snāṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ ca saṃpūjya paramātmānam īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:1049: prakṛteḥ parimiṣṭaṃ ca nirliptaṃ nirguṇaṃ param // Jss_1,7.41 //
GR14jnass01u:1050: sākṣiṇaṃ karmaṇām eva brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam /
GR14jnass01u:1051: prayayau purato ramyaṃ rāja-mārgaṃ dadarśa saḥ // Jss_1,7.42 //
GR14jnass01u:1053: pariṣkṛtaṃ ca sarvatra nirmitaṃ viśva-karmaṇā // Jss_1,7.43 //
GR14jnass01u:1057: rathaṃ dadarśa purato manoyāyi manoharam // Jss_1,7.45 //
GR14jnass01u:1059: dhanur lakṣaṃ parimitaṃ parito vartulākṛtam // Jss_1,7.46 //
GR14jnass01u:1061: dhanur lakṣo 'pi sūtaṃ ca vahni-śuddhāṃśukānvitam // Jss_1,7.47 //
GR14jnass01u:1071: golokād āgataṃ pūrvaṃ krīḍārthaṃ śaṅkarasya ca // Jss_1,7.52 //
GR14jnass01u:1073: rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca prayayau kiyad dūraṃ mahā-muniḥ // Jss_1,7.53 //
GR14jnass01u:1079: dadarśa śiviraṃ śambhoḥ parikhābhis tribhir yutam // Jss_1,7.56 //
GR14jnass01u:1081: prakāraiś ca tribhir yuktaṃ dhanur lakṣocchritaṃ suta // Jss_1,7.57 //
GR14jnass01u:1083: dhanuḥ-śata-sahasraṃ ca caturasraṃ ca sammitam // Jss_1,7.58 //
GR14jnass01u:1085: atīva ramyaṃ purato pura-dvāraṃ dadarśa saḥ // Jss_1,7.59 //
GR14jnass01u:1086: purato ratna-bhittau ca kṛtrimaṃ ca suśobhitam /
GR14jnass01u:1087: puṇyaṃ vṛndāvanaṃ ramyaṃ tan-madhye rāsa-maṇḍalam // Jss_1,7.60 //
GR14jnass01u:1091: dvāra-pālaṃ ca tatraiva maṇi-bhadraṃ bhayaṃkaram // Jss_1,7.62 //
GR14jnass01u:1093: taṃ saṃbhāṣya vilokyaivaṃ dvitīya-dvāram īpsitam // Jss_1,7.63 //
GR14jnass01u:1094: jagāma ca muni-śreṣṭho dadarśa citram uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1095: kadambānāṃ samūhaṃ ca tan-mūlaṃ ca manoharam // Jss_1,7.64 //
GR14jnass01u:1097: snātaṃ gopī-samūhaṃ ca nagna-sarvāṅgam adbhutam // Jss_1,7.65 //
GR14jnass01u:1099: tatraiva śūla-hastaṃ ca mahā-kālaṃ dadarśa ca // Jss_1,7.66 //
GR14jnass01u:1100: kṛpāluṃ dvāra-pālaṃ taṃ saṃbhāṣya nārado muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1101: prayayau śīghra-gāmī sa tṛtīya-dvāram uttamam // Jss_1,7.67 //
GR14jnass01u:1103: gopānāṃ ca samūhaṃ ca pītambara-dharaṃ param // Jss_1,7.68 //
GR14jnass01u:1104: bāla-krīḍāṃ ca kurvantaṃ tan-madhye kṛṣṇam uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1105: brāhmaṇībhiḥ pradattam ca bhuktavantaṃ supāyasam // Jss_1,7.69 //
GR14jnass01u:1106: kurvantaṃ ca samādhānaṃ muneḥ vāma-kareṇa ca /
GR14jnass01u:1107: gṛhītvā tad-anujñāṃ ca caturthaṃ dvāram īpsitam // Jss_1,7.70 //
GR14jnass01u:1108: prayayau brahma-putraś ca dadarśa citram uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1109: govardhanaṃ parvataṃ ca tatra kṛṣṇa-kara-sthitam // Jss_1,7.71 //
GR14jnass01u:1111: vyākulaṃ gokulaṃ bhītaṃ śakra-vṛṣṭi-bhayena ca // Jss_1,7.72 //
GR14jnass01u:1112: abhayaṃ dattavantaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ dakṣa-kareṇa ca /
GR14jnass01u:1113: nandinaṃ dvāra-pālaṃ ca śūla-hastaṃ ca sasmitam // Jss_1,7.73 //
GR14jnass01u:1114: vilokya prayayau vipraḥ pañcamaṃ dvāṛam uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1116: tatraiva nīpa-mūlaṃ ca yamunākulam eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1117: kālīya-damanaṃ tatra kṛtimaṃ ca dadarśa ḥa // Jss_1,7.75 //
GR14jnass01u:1118: tad dṛṣṭvā sasmitas tuṣṭaḥ ṣaṣṭa-dvāṛaṃ jagāma saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1119: dvāre niyuktaṃ bālaṃ ca śūla-hastaṃ catur-bhujam // Jss_1,7.76 //
GR14jnass01u:1121: dadarśa citraṃ tatraiva mathurā-gamanaṃ hareḥ // Jss_1,7.77 //
GR14jnass01u:1123: vyākulaṃ gokulaṃ cāpi ratha-sthaṃ śaraṇaṃ harim // Jss_1,7.78/ //
GR14jnass01u:1124: akrūraṃ ca tathā nandaṃ nirānandaṃ śucākulam /
GR14jnass01u:1125: tad dṛṣṭvā saptama-dvāraṃ dvāra-pālaṃ dadarśa saḥ // Jss_1,7.79 //
GR14jnass01u:1127: sabalaṃ gopa-sahitaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,7.80 //
GR14jnass01u:1129: vīkṣantaṃ sādaraṃ sarvair nagara-sthair manoharam // Jss_1,7.81 //
GR14jnass01u:1131: sabhāryaṃ vasudevaṃ ca nigaḍān muktam īpsitam // Jss_1,7.82 //
GR14jnass01u:1133: dhyāna-sthaṃ ca vibhāntaṃ ca śuddha-sphaṭika-mālayā // Jss_1,7.83 //
GR14jnass01u:1135: nirliptaṃ nirguṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paramaṃ prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,7.84 //
GR14jnass01u:1136: dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca sura-śreṣṭhaṃ muni-śreṣṭho 'pi nāradaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1140: bho gaṇeśa sura-śreṣṭha lambodara parāt para /
GR14jnass01u:1147: yaḥ pūjitaḥ surendraiś ca munīndrais taṃ namāmy aham // Jss_1,7.89 //
GR14jnass01u:1149: puṇyakena vratenaiva yaṃ prāpa pārvatī satī // Jss_1,7.90 //
GR14jnass01u:1151: jñāni-śreṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ ca taṃ namāmi gaṇeśvaram // Jss_1,7.91 //
GR14jnass01u:1152: ity evam uktvā devarṣis tatraivāntar dadhe vibhuḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1153: nāradaḥ prayayau śīghram īśvarābhyantaraṃ mudā // Jss_1,7.92 //
GR14jnass01u:1155: pūjā-kāle paṭhen nityaṃ jayas tasya pade pade // Jss_1,7.93 //
GR14jnass01u:1156: saṃkalpitaṃ paṭhed yo hi varṣam ekaṃ susaṃyataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1160: ihaiva ca sukhaṃ bhaktyānte yāti hareḥ padam // Jss_1,7.95 //
GR14jnass01u:1166: dadarśa svāśramaṃ ramyam atīva sumanoharam // Jss_1,8.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1168: sākṣād gorocanābhaiś ca maṇi-stambhair vibhūṣitam // Jss_1,8.2 //
GR14jnass01u:1174: sudhānāṃ ca madhūnām ca pūrṇa-kumbhakaṃ śataṃ śatam // Jss_1,8.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1177: tad dṛṣṭvā ca muni-śreṣṭhas tat parābhyantaraṃ yayau /
GR14jnass01u:1178: ratna-siṃhāsana-sthaṃ ca śaṅkaraṃ ca dadarśa saḥ // Jss_1,8.7 //
GR14jnass01u:1180: prasanna-vadanaṃ svacchaṃ śāntaṃ śrīmantam īśvaram // Jss_1,8.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1182: bhakta-priyaṃ ca bhakteśaṃ jvalantaṃ brahma-tejasā // Jss_1,8.9 //
GR14jnass01u:1184: japantaṃ paramātmānaṃ brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam // Jss_1,8.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1185: nirliptaṃ ca nirīhaṃ ca dātāraṃ sarva-sampadām /
GR14jnass01u:1186: svecchā-mayaṃ sarva-bījaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ prakṛteḥ paraṃ // Jss_1,8.11 //
GR14jnass01u:1187: siddhendraiś ca munīndraiś ca devendraiḥ parisevitam /
GR14jnass01u:1190: purato hi vasantaṃ taṃ skandaṃ gaṇa-patīm tathā // Jss_1,8.13 //
GR14jnass01u:1192: yogīndraṃ sva-guruṃ śaṃbhuṃ śirasā praṇanāma saḥ // Jss_1,8.14 //
GR14jnass01u:1193: tuṣṭāva parayā bhaktyā devarṣir jagatāṃ patim /
GR14jnass01u:1194: sva-guruṃ ca paśu-patiṃ vedoktena stavena ca // Jss_1,8.15 //
GR14jnass01u:1196: namas tubhyaṃ jagan-nātha mama nātha mama prabho /
GR14jnass01u:1198: abījaja praja prāja sarva-bīja namo 'stu te /
GR14jnass01u:1205: ity evam uktvā devarṣiḥ śambhoś ca purataḥ sthitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1206: prasanna-vadanaḥ śrīmān bhagavāṃs tam uvāca saḥ // Jss_1,8.20 //
GR14jnass01u:1208: varaṃ vṛṇu mahā-bhāga yat te manasi vartate /
GR14jnass01u:1209: dāsyāmi tvāṃ dhruvaṃ putra dātāhaṃ sarva-saṃpadām // Jss_1,8.21 //
GR14jnass01u:1210: sukhaṃ muktiṃ harer bhaktiṃ niścalām avināśinīm /
GR14jnass01u:1216: hareḥ padaṃ ca gamanaṃ sa-śarīreṇa līlayā /
GR14jnass01u:1217: eteṣu vāñchitārtheṣu kiṃ vā te vāñchitaṃ suta // Jss_1,8.25 //
GR14jnass01u:1218: tan me brūhi muni-śreṣṭha sarvaṃ dātum ahaṃ kṣamaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1219: śaṅkarasya vacaḥ śrutvā tam uvāca mahā-muniḥ // Jss_1,8.26 //
GR14jnass01u:1221: dehi me hari-bhaktiṃ ca tan-nāma-sevane ruciḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1222: ati-tṛṣṇā guṇākhyāne nityam astu mameśvara // Jss_1,8.27 //
GR14jnass01u:1223: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā jahāsa śaṅkaraḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:1224: pārvatī bhadra-kālī ca kārttikeyo gaṇeśvaraḥ // Jss_1,8.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1225: sarvaṃ dadau mahā-devo nāradāya ca dhīmate /
GR14jnass01u:1227: nāradena kṛtaṃ stotraṃ nityaṃ yaḥ prapaṭhet śuciḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1228: hari-bhaktir bhavet tasya tan-nāmni guṇato ruciḥ // Jss_1,8.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1230: sarva-siddhir bhavet tasya siddha-stotro bhaved yadi // Jss_1,8.31 //
GR14jnass01u:1231: iha prāpnoti lakṣmīṃ ca niścalāṃ lakṣa-pauruṣīm /
GR14jnass01u:1232: pari-pūrṇam ahaiśvaryam ante yāti hareḥ padam // Jss_1,8.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1234: susādhyāṃ suvinītāṃ suvratāṃ ca pati-vratām // Jss_1,8.33 //
GR14jnass01u:1235: prajāṃ bhūmiṃ yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ vidyāṃ sa-kavitāṃ labhet /
GR14jnass01u:1236: prasūyate mahā-bandhyā varṣam ekaṃ śṛṇoti cet // Jss_1,8.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1238: dhanī mahā-daridraś ca kṛpaṇaḥ satyavān bhavet /
GR14jnass01u:1239: viprad-grasto rāja-baddho mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,8.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1243: varaṃ datvā mahā-devo bhaktyā taṃ brāhmaṇātithim /
GR14jnass01u:1244: pūjāṃ cakāra vedoktāṃ svayaṃ veda-vidāṃ varaḥ // Jss_1,9.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1248: mahā-devaḥ sabhā-madhye kṛpayā ca kṛpā-nidhiḥ // Jss_1,9.3 //
GR14jnass01u:1250: kiṃ vā te vāñchitaṃ vatsa brūhi māṃ yadi rocate /
GR14jnass01u:1251: varo dattaḥ kim aparaṃ yat te manasi vartate // Jss_1,9.4 //
GR14jnass01u:1253: kailāse ca sabhā-madhye yat tan-manasi vāñchitam // Jss_1,9.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1256: hari-bhakti-pradaṃ jñānaṃ muktidaṃ jñānam īpsitam // Jss_1,9.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1257: yoga-yuktaṃ ca yaj jñānaṃ jñānaṃ yat siddhidaṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1260: vidhavānāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ yatīnāṃ brahma-cāriṇāṃ // Jss_1,9.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1264: saṃsāra-vāsanāṃ kāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ prakṛtīśayoḥ // Jss_1,9.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1265: tayoḥ paraṃ vā kiṃ vastu tasyāvatāra-varṇamam /
GR14jnass01u:1266: ko vā tad-aṃśaḥ kaḥ pūrṇaḥ paripūrṇatamaś ca kaḥ // Jss_1,9.11 //
GR14jnass01u:1268: yad dattaṃ kiṃ tad deveśa tad ārādhyaṃ prayatnataḥ // Jss_1,9.12 //
GR14jnass01u:1269: mayā jñānaṃm anāpṛṣṭhaṃ yad yad asti surottama /
GR14jnass01u:1270: tan me kathaya tattvena mām evānugrahaṃ kuru // Jss_1,9.13 //
GR14jnass01u:1271: guroś ca jñānodgiraṇāj jñānaṃ syān mantra-tantrayoḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1272: tat tantraṃ sa ca mantraḥ syād yato bhaktir adhokṣaje // Jss_1,9.14 //
GR14jnass01u:1276: nirīkṣya pārvatī-vaktraṃ gaja-vaktram uvāca saḥ // Jss_1,9.16 //
GR14jnass01u:1280: kurvanty ahaitukīṃ bhaktiṃ ye ca śaśvad dhareḥ pade // Jss_1,9.17 //
GR14jnass01u:1284: vāñchanty eva hi tīrthāni vasudhā cātma-śuddhaye // Jss_1,9.19 //
GR14jnass01u:1286: punāti sarva-tīrthāni vasudhām api pārvati // Jss_1,9.20 //
GR14jnass01u:1287: kṛṣṇa-mantro dvija-mukhād yasya karṇaṃ prayāti ca /
GR14jnass01u:1288: taṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ jagat-pūtaṃ pravadanti purā-vidaḥ // Jss_1,9.21 //
GR14jnass01u:1290: punāti līlā-mātreṇa puruṣāṇāṃ śataṃ śatam // Jss_1,9.22 //
GR14jnass01u:1291: yaj janma-mātrāt pūtaṃ ca tat pitṛṇāṃ śataṃ śatam /
GR14jnass01u:1292: prayāti sadyo golokaṃ karma-bhogāt pramucyate // Jss_1,9.23 //
GR14jnass01u:1294: yat kanyāṃ pratigṛhṇāti tasya saptāvalīlayā // Jss_1,9.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1295: mātaraṃ tat-praśūṃ bhāryāṃ putrāc ca sapta-pūruṣam /
GR14jnass01u:1296: bhrātaraṃ bhaginīṃ kanyāṃ kṛṣṇa-bhaktaḥ samuddharet // Jss_1,9.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1298: phalaṃ sa lebhe pūjānāṃ vratī sarva-vrateṣu ca // Jss_1,9.26 //
GR14jnass01u:1299: viṣṇu-mantraṃ yo labhet vaiṣṇavāc ca dvijottamāt /
GR14jnass01u:1300: koṭi-janmārjitāt pāpān mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,9.27 //
GR14jnass01u:1302: śata-janmārjitāt pāpān mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,9.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1304: sadyaḥ pūtaṃ jalaṃ vahnir jagat pūtaḥ samīraṇaḥ // Jss_1,9.29 //
GR14jnass01u:1305: darśanaṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca devā vāñchanti nityaśaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1306: na vaiṣṇavāt paraḥ pūto viśveṣu nikhileṣu ca // Jss_1,9.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1307: ity uktvā saṅkaraḥ śīghraṃ nāradena sahātmajaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1308: yayau mandākinī-tīraṃ nīraṃ kṣīropamaṃ param // Jss_1,9.31 //
GR14jnass01u:1309: tatra snāto mahā-devī nāradaś ca mahā-muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1310: samācāntaḥ śucis tatra dhṛtvā dhaute ca vāsavī // Jss_1,9.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1315: mantraṃ gṛhītvā sa muniḥ śivaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam /
GR14jnass01u:1316: sapta vārān namas kṛtya svātmānaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadau // Jss_1,9.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1319: etasminn antare vatsa puṣpa-vṛṣṭir babhūva ha /
GR14jnass01u:1320: nāradopari tatraiva suśrāva dundubhir muniḥ // Jss_1,9.37 //
GR14jnass01u:1322: brahmā jagāma tatraiva suprasannaś ca sasmitaḥ // Jss_1,9.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1324: śambhuś ca pūjayām āsa brāhmaṇam atithiṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1325: śambhuṃ śubhāśiṣaṃ kṛtvā brahma-lokaṃ yayau vidhiḥ // Jss_1,9.39 //
GR14jnass01u:1330: nārado hi mahā-jñānī devarṣir brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1331: sarva-veda-vidāṃ śreṣṭho gariṣṭhaś ca variṣṭhakaḥ // Jss_1,10.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1332: kathaṃ sa nopadiṣṭaś ca jñāna-hīno mahā-muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1333: tan māṃ bodhaya vibho sandeha-bhañjanaṃ kuru // Jss_1,10.2 //
GR14jnass01u:1335: nārado brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ purā-kalpe babhūva saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1336: sarva-jñānaṃ dadau tasmai vidhātā jagatām api // Jss_1,10.3 //
GR14jnass01u:1337: vedāṃś ca pāṭhayām āsa vedāṅgāny api suvrata /
GR14jnass01u:1339: bhagavān ekadā putraṃ kathayām āsa saṃsadi /
GR14jnass01u:1340: sṛṣṭiṃ kuru mahā-bhāga kṛtvā dāra-parigraham // Jss_1,10.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1342: uvāca pitaraṃ kopāt paraṃ kṛṣṇa-parāyanaḥ // Jss_1,10.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1344: sarveṣām api vandyānāṃ pitā caiva mahā-guruḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1345: jñāna-dātuḥ paro vandyo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati // Jss_1,10.7 //
GR14jnass01u:1347: janma-dātānna-dātā syāt sneha-kartā pitā sadā // Jss_1,10.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1348: na kṣamau tau ca pitarau putrasya karma khaṇḍitum /
GR14jnass01u:1350: guruś ca jñānodgiraṇāt jñānaṃ syān mantra-tantrayoḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1351: tat tantraṃ sa ca mantraś ca kṛṣṇa-bhaktir yato bhavet // Jss_1,10.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1353: viṣam atyamṛtaṃ tyaktvā sa ca mūḍho narādhamaḥ // Jss_1,10.11 //
GR14jnass01u:1354: sa guruḥ sa pitā vandyaḥ sā mātā sa patiḥ sutaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1355: yo dadāti harau bhaktiṃ karma-mūla-nikṛntanī // Jss_1,10.12 //
GR14jnass01u:1358: aho jagad-vidhātuś ca dharma-śāstur iyaṃ matiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1359: svayaṃ māyā-mohitaś ca paraṃ bhraṣṭaṃ karoti ca // Jss_1,10.14 //
GR14jnass01u:1360: viṣṇus tvāṃ mohitām kṛtvā yuyoja sraṣṭum īśvaraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1361: na dadau svātma-bhaktiṃ tāṃ sva-dāsyaṃ cāti-durlabham // Jss_1,10.15 //
GR14jnass01u:1363: sa ca bālo na jānāti kathaṃbhūtaṃ ca modakam // Jss_1,10.16 //
GR14jnass01u:1364: bālakaṃ vañcanaṃ kṛtvā miṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ pradāya saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1365: pitā prayāti kāryārthaṃ viṣṇunā mohitas tathā // Jss_1,10.17 //
GR14jnass01u:1367: na yuktaṃ patanaṃ tatra tad uddhāram abhīpsitam // Jss_1,10.18 //
GR14jnass01u:1368: jñānī guruś ca balavān bhavābdheḥ śiṣyam uddharet /
GR14jnass01u:1369: guruḥ svayam asiddhaś ca durbalaḥ katham uddharet // Jss_1,10.19 //
GR14jnass01u:1372: sa guruḥ paramo vairī yo dadāti hy asan-matim /
GR14jnass01u:1373: taṃ namas-kṛtya sat-śiṣyaḥ prayāti jñānadaṃ gurum // Jss_1,10.21 //
GR14jnass01u:1375: durbalo durvahaṃ bhāraṃ dadāti janakāya ca // Jss_1,10.22 //
GR14jnass01u:1376: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhaḥ putram uvāca saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1379: jñānaṃ te bhavatu bhraṣṭaṃ strī-jito bhava pāmara /
GR14jnass01u:1380: sarva-jātiṣu gandharvaḥ kāmī so 'pi bhavān bhava // Jss_1,10.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1382: tāsāṃ vaśaś ca satataṃ strīṇāṃ krīḍā mṛgo yathā // Jss_1,10.25 //
GR14jnass01u:1384: tāsāṃ nityaṃ yauvanānāṃ sundarīṇāṃ priyo bhava // Jss_1,10.26 //
GR14jnass01u:1386: nirjane nirjane ramye vane krīḍāṃ kariṣyasi // Jss_1,10.27 //
GR14jnass01u:1388: vipra-dāsyāṃ tu śūdrāyāṃ janiṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,10.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1391: tātasya vacanaṃ śrutvā cukopa nārado muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1392: śaśāpa pitaraṃ śighraṃ dāruṇaṃ ca yathocitam // Jss_1,10.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1393: apūjyo bhava duṣṭaṃ tvaṃ tvan-mantropāsakaḥ kutaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1394: agamyāgamanecchā te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,10.31 //
GR14jnass01u:1395: nāradasya tu śāpena so 'pūjyo jagatāṃ vidhiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1396: dṛṣṭvā sva-kanyā-rūpaṃ ca paścād dhāvitavān purā // Jss_1,10.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1398: lajjitaḥ kāma-yuktaś ca punar brahmā babhūva saḥ // Jss_1,10.33 //
GR14jnass01u:1400: vipra-dehaṃ parityajya gandharvaś ca babhūva saḥ // Jss_1,10.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1402: jahāra kanyāḥ pañcāśat balāc citra-rathasya tu // Jss_1,10.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1403: gāndharvena vivāhena tā uvāha ca nirjane /
GR14jnass01u:1404: mūrcchāṃ prāpuś ca tāḥ kanyā dṛṣṭvā sundaram īśvaram // Jss_1,10.36 //
GR14jnass01u:1405: visaspuruś ca pitaraṃ mātaraṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1406: remire tena sārdhaṃ ca kāmukyaḥ kāmukena ca // Jss_1,10.37 //
GR14jnass01u:1408: śaile śaile surahasi kānane kānane tathā // Jss_1,10.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1409: puṣpodyane taru-dyāne nadyāṃ nadyāṃ nade nade /
GR14jnass01u:1418: divāniśaṃ na jānanti kāminā sasmitena ca // Jss_1,10.43 //
GR14jnass01u:1420: svāhā-vane kāmyake ca ramyake pāribhadrake // Jss_1,10.44 //
GR14jnass01u:1421: surandhake gandhake ca suraṅhre puṇḍrake 'pi ca /
GR14jnass01u:1426: suvele ca supārśve ca pravālāṃkura-kānane // Jss_1,10.47 //
GR14jnass01u:1427: mandāre mandire pūre gāndhāre ca yugandhare /
GR14jnass01u:1430: campakānāṃ palāśānāṃ kundānāṃ vipine tathā // Jss_1,10.49 //
GR14jnass01u:1436: jambīrāṇāṃ ca jambūnāṃ karañjānāṃ tathaiva ca // Jss_1,10.52 //
GR14jnass01u:1437: kṛtvā bihāraṃ tābhiś ca gandharvaś copavarhaṇaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1438: divyaṃ varṣa-sahasraṃ ca svāśramaṃ punar āyayau // Jss_1,10.53 //
GR14jnass01u:1439: śrutvā vidhātur āhvānaṃ puṣkaraṃ ca yayau punaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1443: suśobhitaṃ yathā candraṃ gagane bhagaṇaiḥ saha /
GR14jnass01u:1444: praṇanāma sabhā-madhye tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ jagad-vidhim // Jss_1,10.56 //
GR14jnass01u:1445: maheśaṃ ca gaṇeśaṃ ca dhaneśaṃ śeṣam īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:1448: yamam aṣṭau vasūn rudrān jayantaṃ nalakūvaram // Jss_1,10.58 //
GR14jnass01u:1450: agastyaṃ ca pulastyaṃ ca pulahaṃ ca pracetasam // Jss_1,10.59 //
GR14jnass01u:1451: sarva-śreṣṭhaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca dakṣaṃ ca kardamaṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1452: sanakaṃ sanandaṃ ca tṛtīyaṃ ca sanātanam // Jss_1,10.60 //
GR14jnass01u:1453: sanat-kumāraṃ yogīśaṃ jñānināṃ ca guror gurum /
GR14jnass01u:1454: voḍhuṃ pañca-śikhaṃ saṅkhaṃ bhṛgum aṅgirasaṃ tathā // Jss_1,10.61 //
GR14jnass01u:1455: āsuriṃ kapilaṃ kautsaṃ kratuṃ nārāyaṇaṃ naram /
GR14jnass01u:1456: marīciṃ kaśyapaṃ kaṇvaṃ vyāsaṃ durvāsasaṃ kavim // Jss_1,10.62 //
GR14jnass01u:1457: bṛhaspatiṃ ca cyavanaṃ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ ca lomaśam /
GR14jnass01u:1458: vālmīkiṃ paraśu-rāmaṃ saṃvartaṃ ca vibhāṇḍakam // Jss_1,10.63 //
GR14jnass01u:1460: etān sarvān namas-kṛtya tasthau sa purato vidheḥ // Jss_1,10.64 //
GR14jnass01u:1461: tuṣṭāva sarvān devāṃś ca munīndrāṃś ca tathaiva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1462: tam uvāca sabhā-madhye vidhātā jagatām api /
GR14jnass01u:1463: sasmitaḥ suprasannaś ca gandharvam upavarhaṇam // Jss_1,10.65 //
GR14jnass01u:1466: kuru vatsādhunātraiva śṛṇvantu munayaḥ surāḥ // Jss_1,10.66 //
GR14jnass01u:1468: tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ jala-krīḍāṃ harer utkīrtanaṃ kuru // Jss_1,10.67 //
GR14jnass01u:1470: śrotāraṃ ca pravaktāraṃ puruṣaiḥ saptabhiḥ saha // Jss_1,10.68 //
GR14jnass01u:1472: tatra sarvāṇi tīrthāni puṇyāni maṅgalāni ca // Jss_1,10.69 //
GR14jnass01u:1474: dūrād eva palāyante vainateyam ivoragāḥ // Jss_1,10.70 //
GR14jnass01u:1475: tad dinaṃ saphalaṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ sarva-maṅgalam /
GR14jnass01u:1476: śrī-kṛṣṇa-kīrtanaṃ yatra tatraiva nāyuṣo vyayaḥ // Jss_1,10.71 //
GR14jnass01u:1477: saṃkīrtana-dhvaniṃ śrutvā ye ca nṛtyanti vaiṣṇavāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1478: teṣāṃ pāda-rajaḥ-sparśāt sadyaḥ pūtā vasundharā // Jss_1,10.72 //
GR14jnass01u:1480: sthānaṃ tac ca bhavet tīrthaṃ mṛtānāṃ tatra muktidam // Jss_1,10.73 //
GR14jnass01u:1481: nātra pāpāni tiṣṭhanti puṇyāni susthirāṇi ca /
GR14jnass01u:1482: tapasvināṃ ca vratināṃ vratānāṃ tapasāṃ sthalam // Jss_1,10.74 //
GR14jnass01u:1483: vartate pāpināṃ dehe pāpāni tri-vidhāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:1486: strīṇāṃ ca vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca sa mahā-pātakī smṛtaḥ // Jss_1,10.76 //
GR14jnass01u:1487: bhrūṇā-ghnaś cāpi go-ghnaś ca śūdra-ghnaś ca kṛta-ghnakaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1488: viśvāsa-ghātī viḍ-bhojī sa eva hy upapātakī // Jss_1,10.77 //
GR14jnass01u:1492: mucyante pātakais tais taiḥ pāpinas tri-vidhāḥ smṛtāḥ // Jss_1,10.79 //
GR14jnass01u:1494: bhikṣur yatir brahma-cārī vāna-prasthaś ca tāpasaḥ // Jss_1,10.80 //
GR14jnass01u:1495: pavitraḥ paramo vahniḥ supavitraṃ jalaṃ yathā /
GR14jnass01u:1496: ete sarve vaiṣṇavānāṃ kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm // Jss_1,10.81 //
GR14jnass01u:1498: paśyanti ca śilā-cakraṃ pūjāṃ kurvanti nityaśaḥ // Jss_1,10.82 //
GR14jnass01u:1499: jīvan-muktās ca te dhanyā hari-dāsāś ca bhārate /
GR14jnass01u:1500: pade pade 'śvamedhasya prāpnuvanti phalaṃ dhruvam // Jss_1,10.83 //
GR14jnass01u:1502: teṣāṃ ca pāda-rajasā tīrthaṃ pūtaṃ tathā dharā // Jss_1,10.84/ //
GR14jnass01u:1503: teṣāṃ ca darśanaṃ sparśaṃ vāñchanti munayaḥ surāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1504: puruṣāṇāṃ sahasraṃ ca pūtaṃ taj-janma-mātrataḥ // Jss_1,10.85 //
GR14jnass01u:1505: ity uktvā jagatāṃ dhātā tatra tūṣṇīṃ babhūva saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1506: āścaryaṃ menire śrutvā devāś ca munayas tathā // Jss_1,10.86 //
GR14jnass01u:1508: gandharvāś cāpi vividhā nanṛtuḥ kinnarā jaguḥ // Jss_1,10.87 //
GR14jnass01u:1509: rambhor vaśī ghṛtācī ca menakā ca tilottamā /
GR14jnass01u:1510: sudhāmukhī pūrṇa-cittī mohinī kalikā tathā // Jss_1,10.88 //
GR14jnass01u:1512: etāś cānyāś ca bahvyaś ca śvaśvat susthira-yauvanāḥ // Jss_1,10.89 //
GR14jnass01u:1514: īṣaddhāsyāḥ prasannāsyāḥ kāmārtāś ca samāyayuḥ // Jss_1,10.90 //
GR14jnass01u:1515: veda-jñā mūrtimantaś ca vedāś cātvāra eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1516: brāhmaṇā bhikṣavaḥ siddhā yatayo brahma-cāriṇaḥ // Jss_1,10.91 //
GR14jnass01u:1518: lakṣmī sarasvatī durgā sāvitrī rohiṇī ratiḥ // Jss_1,10.92 //
GR14jnass01u:1519: tulasī pṛthivī gaṅgā svāhā ca yamunā tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1520: vāruṇī manasendrāṇī tāḥ sarvā deva-yoṣitaḥ // Jss_1,10.93 //
GR14jnass01u:1523: vicitrāṃ ca brahma-sabhāṃ puṣkaraṃ tīrtham āyayuḥ // Jss_1,10.94 //
GR14jnass01u:1529: atha gandharva-rājas tu bhagavān ājñayā vidheḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1530: saṃgītaṃ ca jagau tatra kṛṣṇa-rāsa-mahotsavam // Jss_1,11.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1531: susamaṃ tālamānaṃ ca sutānaṃ madhuraṃ śrutam /
GR14jnass01u:1537: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā surāḥ sarve munayaḥ sarva-yoṣitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1538: mūrcchāṃ prāyuś ca sahasā cetanāṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,11.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1540: tābhyo vastra-pradānaṃ ca saṃmānaṃ varadānakam // Jss_1,11.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1544: saṃprāpuś ca punar mūrcchāṃ punaḥ prāpuś ca cetanām // Jss_1,11.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1545: tasmai dadau puro brahmā vahni-śuddhāṃśukaṃ param /
GR14jnass01u:1551: pratyekaṃ vastu ruciraṃ tad-yoṣidbhyaś ca saṃdadau /
GR14jnass01u:1552: viśvakarmā ca nirmāṇa-maṇiṃ bhūṣaṇam uttamam // Jss_1,11.12 //
GR14jnass01u:1562: dhanur lakṣocchritaṃ caiva sahasrāśvena yojitam // Jss_1,11.17/
GR14jnass01u:1563: etad eva dadau brahmā prahṛṣṭas tuṣṭa eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1564: śambhus tuṣṭo dadau hṛṣṭo hari-bhaktiṃ ca niścalām // Jss_1,11.18 //
GR14jnass01u:1567: hareś carcāvidhānaṃ ca stavanaṃ pūjanaṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1571: nāgebhyaś cābhyaṃ nityaṃ hisra-jantubhya eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1573: nirvighnatvaṃ dadau tasmai vighn-rājaś ca saṃsadi /
GR14jnass01u:1576: maṇi-rājaṃ sudīptaṃ ca triṣu lokeṣu durlabham // Jss_1,11.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1577: sarvatra vijayaṃ caiva vāñcchitaṃ nirmalaṃ yaśaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1579: lakṣa-svarṇaṃ dhaneśaś ca dāsānāṃ ca śataṃ śatam /
GR14jnass01u:1580: dharmaḥ kīrtimayīṃ mālāṃ skando dhairyaṃ dadau tathā // Jss_1,11.26 //
GR14jnass01u:1583: candraḥ śvetāśva-ratnaṃ ca hy amūlyam uttamaṃ dadau /
GR14jnass01u:1584: vahni-śuddhāṃśuka-yugaṃ dadau vahniś ca saṃsadi // Jss_1,11.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1585: upendro ratna-koṭiṃ ca tad evendro dadau purā /
GR14jnass01u:1586: vīṇā-śilpaṃ viśvakarmā varuṇaś ca maṇi-srajam // Jss_1,11.29 //
GR14jnass01u:1592: vasavaś ca vasūn divyān rudras tebhyo 'bhayaṃ dadau // Jss_1,11.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1596: lakṣmīś ca paramaiśvaryaṃ bhāratī hāram uttamam // Jss_1,11.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1598: tat-patnībhyaś ca ratnāni sindūrābharaṇāni ca // Jss_1,11.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1600: tulasī cātulaṃ mālyaṃ divyaṃ vasu vasundharā // Jss_1,11.36 //
GR14jnass01u:1601: gaṅgā ca vipulaṃ puṇyaṃ svāhā sad-ratna-pāśakam /
GR14jnass01u:1602: yamunā jalajaṃ padmam amlānaṃ sārvakālikam // Jss_1,11.37 //
GR14jnass01u:1603: vāruṇīṃ vāruṇī tuṣṭā ratna-pātraṃ śacī dadau /
GR14jnass01u:1604: manasā pradadau tasmai nāgānāṃ mauli-maṇḍanam // Jss_1,11.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1605: gandharvāś cāpi tat-patnyaḥ sva-śilpaṃ pradadus tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1612: kiṃ babhūva rahasyaṃ ca tan māṃ vyākhyātum arhasi // Jss_1,12.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1615: teṣāṃ ca purato bhaktyā vidayām āsa vai sadā // Jss_1,12.2 //
GR14jnass01u:1616: śrutvā tad vacanaṃ brahmā tam uvāca ca saṃsadi /
GR14jnass01u:1617: śambhunā ca samālocya brahmovāca vidhātā jagatām api // Jss_1,12.3 //
GR14jnass01u:1619: vilāpaṃ gopa-gopīnāṃ śrāvayāsmāṃś ca sāmpratam // Jss_1,12.4/ //
GR14jnass01u:1620: mahotsavaṃ kuru punaḥ śṛṇvantu munayaḥ surāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1621: gāyantu tāś ca saṃgītaṃ nṛtyantv apsarāṃ gaṇāḥ // Jss_1,12.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1622: brahmaṇaś ca vacaḥ śrutvā nanṛtyuś cāpsarogaṇāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1623: cakrus tāḥ sarasaṃ gītaṃ vidyādharyaś ca saṃsadi // Jss_1,12.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1627: mūrcchāṃ prāpuś ca rurudur dadur dānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,12.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1629: visvareṇa vitanāt tu tāla-bhaṅgo babhūva ha // Jss_1,12.9 //
GR14jnass01u:1630: tat tāla-bhaṅgaṃ vijñāya devāś ca munayas tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1631: cukupuḥ sahasā sarve nirgatās tan mukhāgnayaḥ // Jss_1,12.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1632: tad dṛṣṭvā sahasā bhīto gandharvaś copavarhaṇaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1633: sasmāra kṛṣṇaṃ svabhīṣṭaṃ paramātmānam īśvaram // Jss_1,12.11 //
GR14jnass01u:1636: stambhitā vahnayaḥ sarve munayaś ca vijṛmbhitāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1638: dadṛśur devatāḥ sarvāḥ munayaś cāpi yoṣitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1639: gandharvāś ca tathaivānye tejo dṛśyaṃ sukha-pradam // Jss_1,12.14 //
GR14jnass01u:1642: tat tejo 'bhyantare sarve dadṛśū ratham uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1652: mālājālais tri-lakṣaiś ca mālatīnāṃ ca maṇḍitam /
GR14jnass01u:1653: evaṃbhūtaṃ rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā dadṛśus te tad-anantare // Jss_1,12.21 //
GR14jnass01u:1661: paraṃ pradhānaṃ paramaṃ paramātmānam īśvaram // Jss_1,12.25 //
GR14jnass01u:1664: nityaṃ nityaṃ nirguṇaṃ ca jyoti-rūpaṃ sanātanam /
GR14jnass01u:1667: mayūra-puccha-cūḍaṃ ca varaṃ vaṃśī-dharaṃ paraṃ // Jss_1,12.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1668: dṛṣṭvā tam adbhutaṃ rūpaṃ tuṣṭāva kamalodbhavaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1669: gaṇeśaḥ śeṣaḥ śambhuś ca tad-anye munayaḥ surāḥ // Jss_1,12.29 //
GR14jnass01u:1671: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma paramātmānam īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:1672: vande vandyaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sarva-kāraṇa-kāraṇam // Jss_1,12.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1674: vedāvedyaṃ ca vidvadbhir na dṛṣṭaṃ svapna-gocare // Jss_1,12.31 //
GR14jnass01u:1677: prasiddhaṃ siddhidaṃ śāntaṃ siddhānāṃ ca guror gurum // Jss_1,12.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1678: vande vandyaṃ ca mahatāṃ parāt parataraṃ vibhum /
GR14jnass01u:1681: sva-pada-pradam ekaṃ ca dātāraṃ sarva-sampadām // Jss_1,12.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1683: vaktrāṇāṃ ca sahasreṇa kiṃ vā staumi śruti-śrutam /
GR14jnass01u:1684: koṭibhiḥ koṭibhir vaktraiḥ ko vā stotuṃ kṣamaḥ prabho // Jss_1,12.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1685: kim u stoṣyati śambhuś ca pañca-vaktreṇa vāñcchitam /
GR14jnass01u:1686: kartā caturṇāṃ vedānāṃ kiṃ stoṣyati catur-mukhaḥ // Jss_1,12.36 //
GR14jnass01u:1687: ṣaḍ-vaktro gaja-vaktraś ca devāś ca munayo 'pi vā /
GR14jnass01u:1688: vedā vā kiṃ veda-vidaḥ stuvanti prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,12.37 //
GR14jnass01u:1690: veda-vijñāta-vākyena vidvāṃsaḥ kiṃ stuvanti tam // Jss_1,12.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1692: mūrkho vadati viṣṇāya budho vadati viṣṇave /
GR14jnass01u:1693: nama ity evam artham ca dvayor eva samaṃ phalam // Jss_1,12.39 //
GR14jnass01u:1694: yasmai dattaṃ ca yaj jñānaṃ jñāna-dātā hariḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:1695: jñānena tena sa stauti bhāva-grāhī janārdanaḥ // Jss_1,12.40 //
GR14jnass01u:1697: adhanī ca dhanī vāpi saputro vāpy aputrakaḥ // Jss_1,12.41 //
GR14jnass01u:1698: karmaṇā param īśaṃ ca stotuṃ ko vāpy anuttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1699: yathā-śakti stutiḥ pūjā vandanaṃ smaraṇaṃ hareḥ // Jss_1,12.42 //
GR14jnass01u:1701: kurvanti santo 'santaś ca santataṃ paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,12.43 //
GR14jnass01u:1704: jñānānurūpaṃ stavanaṃ santo naiva hasanti tam // Jss_1,12.44 //
GR14jnass01u:1706: sarve sva-karma-vaśa-gā niṣekaḥ kena vāryate // Jss_1,12.45 //
GR14jnass01u:1707: sarveśvaraṃ ca saṃvīkṣya sarvo vadati mat-prabhum /
GR14jnass01u:1708: mad-īśvarasya samatā sarveṣu kiṃkareṣu ca // Jss_1,12.46 //
GR14jnass01u:1710: kecit tad-aṃśāṃśaṃ prāpnuvanti krameṇa tam // Jss_1,12.47 //
GR14jnass01u:1712: ahaṃ sākṣī ca sarveṣāṃ vidhinā nirmitaḥ purā /
GR14jnass01u:1713: vidhātuś ca vidhātā tvaṃ sarveśvaraṃ namo 'stu te // Jss_1,12.48 //
GR14jnass01u:1715: yaṃ stotum asamarthaś ca sahasrāyuḥ svayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1716: jñānādhidevaḥ śambhuś ca taṃ stotuṃ kiṃ vayaṃ kṣamāḥ // Jss_1,12.49 //
GR14jnass01u:1718: kiṃ jānīmo vayaṃ ke vāpy ananteśasya yo guṇaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1719: vayaṃ vedāś tvam asmākaṃ kāraṇasyāpi kārakaḥ // Jss_1,12.50 //
GR14jnass01u:1721: yadi vedā na jānanti māhātmyaṃ paramātmanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1722: na jānīmas tava guṇaṃ vedānusāriṇo vayam // Jss_1,12.51 //
GR14jnass01u:1725: vedādhidevo dhātā ca tad-īśaṃ staumi kiṃ prabho // Jss_1,12.52 //
GR14jnass01u:1727: yat pāda-padmaṃ padmeśaḥ śeṣāś cānye surās tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1728: dhyāyante munayo devā dhyāye taṃ prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,12.53 //
GR14jnass01u:1731: tvām eva dhatte dhātaraṃ namāmi tri-guṇāt param // Jss_1,12.54 //
GR14jnass01u:1733: tava vakṣasi rādhāhaṃ rāse vṛndāvane vane /
GR14jnass01u:1734: mahā-lakṣmīś ca vaikuṇṭhe pāda-padmārcane ratā // Jss_1,12.55 //
GR14jnass01u:1736: brahma-loke ca brahmāṇī veda-mātā ca bhāratī // Jss_1,12.56 //
GR14jnass01u:1737: tavājñayā ca devānām avirbhūtā ca tejasi /
GR14jnass01u:1738: nihatya daityān devārīn datvā rājyaṃ surāya ca // Jss_1,12.57 //
GR14jnass01u:1742: viṣṇor ahaṃ parā-śaktir viṣṇu-māyā ca vaiṣṇavī // Jss_1,12.59 //
GR14jnass01u:1744: viduṣāṃ rasanāgre ca pratyakṣaṃ hi sarasvatī // Jss_1,12.60 //
GR14jnass01u:1745: mahā-viṣṇoś ca mātāhaṃ viśvāni yasya lomasu /
GR14jnass01u:1751: yoginaḥ santataṃ santaḥ siddhāś ca vaiṣṇavās tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1752: anugrahaṃ kuru vibho buddhi-śaktir ahaṃ tava // Jss_1,12.64 //
GR14jnass01u:1753: iti saṃvṛtaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhet saṃyataḥ śuciḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1754: ihaiva ca sukhaṃ bhuṅkte yāty ante śrī-hareḥ padam // Jss_1,12.65 //
GR14jnass01u:1760: sānandaṃ sundaraṃ śuddhaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,12.67 //
GR14jnass01u:1764: rādhādharaṃ bhavādhāraṃ sarvādhāraṃ namāmi tam // Jss_1,12.69 //
GR14jnass01u:1767: dhyāyante yogino yogāt siddhāḥ siddheśvarāś ca yam /
GR14jnass01u:1768: taṃ dhyāye satataṃ śuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,12.71 //
GR14jnass01u:1770: sevante nirguṇaṃ brahma bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,12.72 //
GR14jnass01u:1771: nirliptaṃ ca nirīhaṃ ca paramātmānam īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:1772: nityaṃ satyaṃ ca paraṃ bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,12.73 //
GR14jnass01u:1773: yaṃ sṛṣṭer ādi-bhūtaṃ ca sarva-bījaṃ parāt param /
GR14jnass01u:1774: yoginas taṃ prapadyante bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,12.74 //
GR14jnass01u:1778: ity evam uktvā gandharvaḥ papāta dharaṇī-tale // Jss_1,12.76 //
GR14jnass01u:1779: nanāma daṇḍavad bhūmau deva-devaṃ parāt param /
GR14jnass01u:1780: iti tena kṛtaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhet prayataḥ śuciḥ // Jss_1,12.77 //
GR14jnass01u:1781: ihaiva jīvan-muktaś ca pare yāti parāṃ gatim /
GR14jnass01u:1782: hari-bhaktiṃ harer dāsyaṃ goloke ca nirāmayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1783: pārṣada-pravaratvaṃ ca labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,12.78 //
GR14jnass01u:1788: stotrāntare ca kāle ca kiṃ rahasyaṃ babhūva ha /
GR14jnass01u:1789: tan me kathaya bhadraṃ te bhagavan bhagavad-vacaḥ // Jss_1,13.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1791: stotrāntare ca kāle ca gandharvaś copavarhaṇaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1793: sarvair devair ahaṃ śaptaś cādhunā deva-hetunā /
GR14jnass01u:1794: devānām agni-puñjaś ca pradīptaś ca sumeruvat // Jss_1,13.3 //
GR14jnass01u:1795: adhunā ca tvayi gate bhasmāsān māṃ kariṣyati /
GR14jnass01u:1796: ato rakṣa jagannātha māṃ samuddhartum arhasi // Jss_1,13.4 //
GR14jnass01u:1800: mām anāthaṃ bhayākrāntaṃ rakṣa rakṣa surānalāt // Jss_1,13.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1802: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā brahmeśo brahma-saṃsadi // Jss_1,13.7 //
GR14jnass01u:1806: śubhāśrayasya bhaktasya bhayaṃ kiṃ te mayi sthite // Jss_1,13.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1810: punar na vidyate janma mantra-grahaṇa-mātrataḥ // Jss_1,13.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1811: nāsti kālād bhayaṃ tasya na niṣekād vidher api /
GR14jnass01u:1813: man-mantro hi dehāt pāpaṃ koṭi-janma-kṛtaṃ ca yat /
GR14jnass01u:1814: sudīpto jvalad-agniś ca tṛṇa-puñjaṃ dehād yathā // Jss_1,13.12 //
GR14jnass01u:1816: teṣāṃ pāpāni vepante koṭi-janma-kṛtāni ca // Jss_1,13.13 //
GR14jnass01u:1818: ante dāsyaṃ ca labhate gatvā golokam uttamam // Jss_1,13.14 //
GR14jnass01u:1819: yāvad āyur bhramet tāvat svatantro matta-kuñjaraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1820: tataḥ pāpāḥ phalāyante vainateyād ivoragāḥ // Jss_1,13.15 //
GR14jnass01u:1821: teṣāṃ ca pāda-rajasā sadyaḥ pūtā vasundharā /
GR14jnass01u:1822: punāti sarva-tīrthāni dūrato darśanād api // Jss_1,13.16 //
GR14jnass01u:1823: pūtaś ca pavano vahnir jalaṃ ca tulasī-dalam /
GR14jnass01u:1824: pūtāny eva hi tīrthāni gaṅgādīni ca gāyana // Jss_1,13.17 //
GR14jnass01u:1825: pūtā suśīlā dharmiṣṭhā suvratā strī pati-vratā /
GR14jnass01u:1826: man-mantropāsakāś caiva tebhyaḥ pūtottamāḥ sadā // Jss_1,13.18 //
GR14jnass01u:1828: śrāddhaṃ dānaṃ pūjanaṃ ca yathā carvita-carvaṇam // Jss_1,13.19 //
GR14jnass01u:1829: bhaktyā tīrthāni pūtāni svataḥ pūto hi vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1830: tat tantraṃ ca tathā dāna-malaṃ śrāddhaṃ ca niṣphalam // Jss_1,13.20 //
GR14jnass01u:1831: śrāddhasya sampradānaṃ ca kartuś ca puruṣa-trayam /
GR14jnass01u:1832: puruṣāṇāṃ śataṃ muktaṃ ko bhuṅkte śrāddha-vastu ca // Jss_1,13.21 //
GR14jnass01u:1833: kecid evaṃ vadantīti pitṛ-lokārtham eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1834: tad-viruddhaṃ ca te tuṣṭā mantra-grahaṇa-mātrataḥ // Jss_1,13.22 //
GR14jnass01u:1835: teṣāṃ śubhāśiṣaṃ karma naiva bhogāya kalpate /
GR14jnass01u:1836: devān na prabhaved vatsa siddha-dhānye yathāṅkuraḥ // Jss_1,13.23 //
GR14jnass01u:1838: mantropāsakād anye karma-bhogaṃ ca bhuñjate // Jss_1,13.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1839: mayā svayaṃ pradattaś ca sva-mantraḥ puruṣāya ca /
GR14jnass01u:1840: para-dvārād grāhayitvā bhaktaṃ muktaṃ karomy aham // Jss_1,13.25 //
GR14jnass01u:1841: mayā pradatta-mantraś ca purā mṛtyuñjayas tathā /
