GR14jnass01u:1844: kapilāya ca śeṣāya gaṇeśāya ca mahā-mate // Jss_1,13.27 //
GR14jnass01u:1846: punar mahā-viṣṇave ca viśvāni yasya lomasu // Jss_1,13.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1848: upendrāya ca kāmāya bhṛgave 'ṅgirase tathā // Jss_1,13.29 //
GR14jnass01u:1850: śavitryai viṣṇu-māyāyai pārṣadebhyaś ca putraka // Jss_1,13.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1851: tubhyaṃ na datto mantro 'tra śrūyatāṃ tan nimittakam /
GR14jnass01u:1853: ity evaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ gaccha vatsa yathā sukham /
GR14jnass01u:1856: daśābdānte vapus tyaktvā brahma-putro bhaviṣyasi // Jss_1,13.33 //
GR14jnass01u:1858: ity evam uktvā sarvātmā tatraivāntaradhīyata // Jss_1,13.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1859: gandharvaḥ prayayau tasmād yoṣidbhiḥ saha putraka /
GR14jnass01u:1860: ity evaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ pūrva-vṛttāntam eva ca // Jss_1,13.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1866: babhūva kiṃ rahasyaṃ ca gate gandharva-puṅgave // Jss_1,14.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1868: sarve devāś ca munayaḥ prayāte paramātmani /
GR14jnass01u:1869: sarve babhūvus te tūṣṇīṃ vayāṃsīva dinātyaye // Jss_1,14.2 //
GR14jnass01u:1873: rakṣitā yasya bhagavān kalyāṇaṃ tasya santatam /
GR14jnass01u:1874: sa yasya vighna-kartā ca rakṣituṃ taṃ ca kaḥ kṣamaḥ // Jss_1,14.4 //
GR14jnass01u:1876: vighnaṃ kartuṃ ke samarthās teṣāṃ ca munayaḥ surāḥ // Jss_1,14.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1877: kopāgnināṃ sthalaṃ kutra stambhitānāṃ ca sāmpratam /
GR14jnass01u:1878: devānāṃ ca munīnāṃ ca kṣaṇenaiveśvarecchayā // Jss_1,14.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1879: yadi tiṣṭhanti bhūmau ca dagdha-śasyā vasundharā /
GR14jnass01u:1880: jale yadi tatas taptaṃ naṣṭhāste jala-jantavaḥ // Jss_1,14.7 //
GR14jnass01u:1881: sthāle dahanti lokāṃś ca vṛkṣāṃś ca pralayāgnayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1882: vidhānaṃ kartum ucitam eṣāṃ ca jagatāṃ vidhe // Jss_1,14.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1883: tvam eva dhātā jagatāṃ pitā ca viṣṇur īśvaraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1886: ājñāvahāś ca satataṃ dik-pālāś ca dig-īśvarāḥ // Jss_1,14.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1887: tasyaivājñāvaho dharmaḥ sākṣī ca karmaṇāṃ nṛṇām /
GR14jnass01u:1888: bhramanti viṣaye śaśvan mohitā māyayā hareḥ // Jss_1,14.11 //
GR14jnass01u:1889: ahaṃ na pātā na sraṣṭā na saṃhartā ca jīvanām /
GR14jnass01u:1890: nirlipto ' haṃ tapasvī ca harer ārādhanonmukhaḥ // Jss_1,14.12 //
GR14jnass01u:1891: saṃhāra-viṣayaṃ mahyaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaś ca purā dadau /
GR14jnass01u:1892: datvā rudrāya tad ahaṃ tapasyāsu rato hareḥ // Jss_1,14.13 //
GR14jnass01u:1895: mṛtyuñjayo ' haṃ adhunā na ca kālād bhayaṃ mama /
GR14jnass01u:1896: kālaḥ saṃharate sarvaṃ māṃ vinā ca tatheśvaram // Jss_1,14.15 //
GR14jnass01u:1897: purā sarvādi-sarge ca kasyacit sraṣṭur eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1898: bhālodbhavāś ca te rudrās teṣv eko ' haṃ śaṅkaraḥ // Jss_1,14.16 //
GR14jnass01u:1899: kalpaś ca brahmaṇaḥ pāte laye prākṛtike tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1900: sarve naṣṭā viṣayiṇo na bhaktāś ca yatheśvaraḥ // Jss_1,14.17 //
GR14jnass01u:1901: asaṃkhya-brahmaṇaḥ pātaḥ kalpaś cāsaṃkhya eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1902: samatītaḥ kati-vidho bhavitā yā punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,14.18 //
GR14jnass01u:1904: tatra prākṛtikāḥ sarve tiro-bhūtāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,14.19 //
GR14jnass01u:1905: na prākṛto na viṣayī nitya-dehī ca vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1906: harer vareṇāmaro 'haṃ śivādhāras tatas tataḥ // Jss_1,14.20 //
GR14jnass01u:1907: jala-plutaṃ ca viśvaughaṃ laye prākṛtike dhruvam /
GR14jnass01u:1909: sarvā devyo vilīnāś ca kṛṣṇaḥ satyaṃ suniścitam /
GR14jnass01u:1910: sarve pumāṃso līnāś ca satye nitye sanātane // Jss_1,14.22 //
GR14jnass01u:1911: ahaṃ kṛṣṇaś ca prakṛtiḥ pārṣada-pravaro hareḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1912: nityaṃ nityā vidyamānā goloke ca nirāmaye // Jss_1,14.23 //
GR14jnass01u:1913: eka īśo na dvitīya iti sarvādi-sargataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1914: nahi naśyanti tad-bhaktāḥ prakṛti-prākṛte laye // Jss_1,14.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1915: tasya bhaktottamānāṃ ca satataṃ smaraṇena ca /
GR14jnass01u:1916: āyur-vyayo nahi bhavet kathaṃ mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // Jss_1,14.25 //
GR14jnass01u:1918: teṣāṃ bhaktottamānāṃ ca satataṃ smaraṇena ca // Jss_1,14.26 //
GR14jnass01u:1920: atra kalpe bhavān brahmā vyavasthātā ca karmasu // Jss_1,14.27 //
GR14jnass01u:1921: sthalaṃ kopānalānāṃ ca vidhānaṃ yad vidhe kuru /
GR14jnass01u:1922: śambhoś ca vacanaṃ śrutvā kampitaḥ kamalāsanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1923: sthalaṃ cakāra vahnīnām ājñayā śaṅkarasya ca // Jss_1,14.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1928: prākṛteṣu ca deheṣu vyāpāro 'sya mayā kṛtaḥ // Jss_1,14.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1929: mama kopānalaḥ śambho saṃskṛtāgnir dvijasya ca /
GR14jnass01u:1930: bhave bhavatu sarvatra vyāpāro 'sya mayā kṛtaḥ // Jss_1,14.31 //
GR14jnass01u:1931: śeṣasya kopa-vahniś ca śeṣāsye 'stv adhunā śiva /
GR14jnass01u:1932: yato viśvaṃ ca pralaye dahed gomaya-piṇḍavat // Jss_1,14.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1934: bhvatv eva hi sarvatra sarveṣām upakārakaḥ // Jss_1,14.33 //
GR14jnass01u:1935: dharmāsya-kopa-vahniś ca kṛṣṇāgniś ca bhavatv ayam /
GR14jnass01u:1936: adharmaṃ kurvatāṃ sarvaṃ dāhanaṃ ca kariṣyati // Jss_1,14.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1937: sūrya-kopānalaś cāyaṃ dāvāgniś ca vaneṣu ca /
GR14jnass01u:1938: sthitir asya taroḥ skandhe tad-bhakṣyāḥ paśu-pakṣiṇaḥ // Jss_1,14.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1940: dampatyor virahe śaśvad bhakṣyati sma dvayos tanum // Jss_1,14.36 //
GR14jnass01u:1941: indra-kopānalaḥ sadyo vajrāgniś ca babhūva ha /
GR14jnass01u:1942: upendrasyānalaś caiva vidyud eva bhvatv ayam // Jss_1,14.37 //
GR14jnass01u:1943: rudrāṇām āsya-vahniś ca maholkāgnir bhavatv ayam /
GR14jnass01u:1944: gaṇeśāgniḥ pṛthivyāṃ tu yathāsthāne tu tiṣṭhati // Jss_1,14.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1945: yatra tiṣṭhet tad uṣaram evam evaṃ vidur budhāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1946: skanda-kopānalaś caiva raṇāstrāgnir babhūva ha // Jss_1,14.39 //
GR14jnass01u:1948: jagrāhaurva-munis tatra tejasi brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ // Jss_1,14.40 //
GR14jnass01u:1950: brahmaṇaṃ ca namas-kṛtya śaṅkaraṃ tapase yayau // Jss_1,14.41 //
GR14jnass01u:1952: sa babhūva purā putra paramaurvānalaḥ svayam // Jss_1,14.42 //
GR14jnass01u:1953: kāmāgnim ulvaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā vicintya manasā vidhiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1954: samālocya suraiḥ sārdhaṃ munīndraiḥ saha saṃsadi // Jss_1,14.43 //
GR14jnass01u:1955: ajuhāva striyaḥ sarvāḥ suvratāś ca pati-vratāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1956: āyuyur yoṣitaḥ sarvās tā ūcuḥ kamalodbhavam // Jss_1,14.44 //
GR14jnass01u:1958: kim asmān brūhi bhagavan śādhi naḥ karavāma kim /
GR14jnass01u:1959: ālocya manasā sarvaṃ dehi bhāraṃ vayaṃ striyaḥ // Jss_1,14.45 //
GR14jnass01u:1962: viśve ca yoṣitaḥ sarvāḥ śaśvat-kāmā bhavantu ca // Jss_1,14.46 //
GR14jnass01u:1964: tam ūcuḥ yoṣitaḥ sarvā bhayaṃ tyaktvā ca saṃsadi // Jss_1,14.47 //
GR14jnass01u:1966: dhik tvāṃ jagad-vidhiṃ vyarthaṃ cakāra parameśvaraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1968: gṛhītvā madanāgniṃ ca puruṣāś ca tathā striyaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1969: nityaṃ dahanti satataṃ vāstavaṃ duḥsahaṃ param // Jss_1,14.49 //
GR14jnass01u:1971: tena dugdhāḥ striyaḥ sarvāś cāsmākam apareṇa kim // Jss_1,14.50 //
GR14jnass01u:1972: samarpaṇaṃ cet puruṣe yad yasmāsu smarānalaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1973: bhasmī-bhūtaṃ kariṣyāmo rakṣitā ko bhavet tava // Jss_1,14.51 //
GR14jnass01u:1974: pati-vratā-vacaḥ śrutvā tam uvāca śivaḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:1979: pati-vratānāṃ tejaś ca sarvebhyaś ca paraṃ bhavet // Jss_1,14.53 //
GR14jnass01u:1980: nirmāṇaṃ kuru devendra kṛtyāṃ strī-jātim īśvara /
GR14jnass01u:1981: tasyai dehi duḥkha-bījaṃ kāma-kopānalaṃ param // Jss_1,14.54 //
GR14jnass01u:1982: śaṅkarasya vacaḥ śrutvā satvaraṃ jagatāṃ vidhiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1983: sasṛje tat-kṣaṇaṃ mūrtiṃ strī-rūpāṃ sumanoharāṃ // Jss_1,14.55 //
GR14jnass01u:1984: aho rūpam aho veśam aho asyā navaṃ vayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1985: aho cakṣuḥ kaṭākṣaṃ ca munīnāṃ mohayan manaḥ // Jss_1,14.56 //
GR14jnass01u:1987: vicitraṃ kaṭhinaṃ sthūlaṃ śroṇi-yugmaṃ ca sundaram // Jss_1,14.57 //
GR14jnass01u:1992: vapuḥ sukomalam cālaṃ nāti-dīrghaṃ na vakharam /
GR14jnass01u:1999: tasyai dadau ca kāmāgniṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ kamalodbhavaḥ // Jss_1,14.63 //
GR14jnass01u:2000: dṛṣṭvā sā candra-rūpaṃ ca kāmonmattā vicetanā /
GR14jnass01u:2001: kṛtvā kaṭākṣaṃ smerāśyā māṃ bhajasvety uvāca sā // Jss_1,14.64 //
GR14jnass01u:2002: saspitaḥ prayayau candro lajjayā ca sabhā-talāt /
GR14jnass01u:2003: kāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca cakame kāmārtā sā gata-trapā // Jss_1,14.65 //
GR14jnass01u:2004: dudrāva kāmas tasmāc ca tat-paścāt sā dadhāva ca /
GR14jnass01u:2005: jahasur devatāḥ sarvā munayaś cāpi saṃsadi // Jss_1,14.66 //
GR14jnass01u:2006: lajjitā yoṣitah sarvās tāṃ vārayitum akṣamāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2007: sarve cakruḥ parīhāsaṃ strī-vargaṃ śaṅkarādayaḥ // Jss_1,14.67 //
GR14jnass01u:2008: kāmaṃ na labdhvā sā ca strī nivṛtyāgatya saṃsadi /
GR14jnass01u:2009: tam aśvinī-kumāraṃ cāpy uvāca sura-sannidhau // Jss_1,14.68 //
GR14jnass01u:2011: māṃ bhajasva raveḥ putra priyāṃ rasavatīṃ mudā /
GR14jnass01u:2012: śṛṅgāre sukhadāṃ śāntāṃ parāṃ kāmāturāṃ varāṃ // Jss_1,14.69 //
GR14jnass01u:2013: tvayā śārdhaṃ bhramiṣyāmi sundare gahane vane /
GR14jnass01u:2014: rahasi rahasi krīḍāṃ kariṣyāmi divāniśam // Jss_1,14.70 //
GR14jnass01u:2015: madhu-pānaṃ ca dāsyāmi vāsitaṃ cāmalaṃ jalam /
GR14jnass01u:2016: sakarpūraṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ bhoga-vastu manoharam // Jss_1,14.71 //
GR14jnass01u:2020: vacanaṃ vada vāme mām ātmano hṛdayaṅgama /
GR14jnass01u:2021: vihāya kapaṭaṃ kānte kapaṭaṃ dharma-nāśanam // Jss_1,14.73 //
GR14jnass01u:2023: tad-ācāraṃ kati-vidhaṃ tan māṃ vyākhyātum arhasi // Jss_1,14.74 //
GR14jnass01u:2024: aśvinīja-vacaḥ śrutvā kāmārtā tam uvāca sā /
GR14jnass01u:2025: kāmārtānāṃ kva lajjā ca kva bhayaṃ mānam eva ca // Jss_1,14.75 //
GR14jnass01u:2028: sthānaṃ nāsti kṣaṇaṃ nāsti nāsti dūtī tad uttamā /
GR14jnass01u:2029: tenaiva yuvatīnāṃ ca satītvam upajāyate // Jss_1,14.76 //
GR14jnass01u:2031: tad rātraṃ ca pulakitaṃ yonau kaṇḍūyanaṃ paraṃ // Jss_1,14.77 //
GR14jnass01u:2033: sarvaṃ tyajati tad-dhetoḥ putraṃ kāntaṃ gṛhaṃ dhanam // Jss_1,14.78/ //
GR14jnass01u:2034: labdhvā yuvānaṃ puruṣaṃ deśa-tyāgaṃ karoti sā /
GR14jnass01u:2035: tad-uttamaṃ punar labdhvā taṃ tyajet sā kṣaṇena ca // Jss_1,14.79 //
GR14jnass01u:2036: viṣaṃ dātuṃ samarthā sā svāminaṃ guṇināṃ varam /
GR14jnass01u:2037: mlecchaṃ yuvānaṃ samprāpya sarvasvaṃ dātum utsukā // Jss_1,14.80 //
GR14jnass01u:2038: tyajet kula-bhayaṃ lajjāṃ dharmaṃ bandhuṃ yaśaḥ śriyam /
GR14jnass01u:2039: samprāpya rati-śūraṃ ca yuvānaṃ suratonmukham // Jss_1,14.81 //
GR14jnass01u:2041: hṛdayaṃ kṣura-dhārābhaṃ ko vā jānāti tan-manaḥ // Jss_1,14.82 //
GR14jnass01u:2042: vidyucchaṭā jale rekhā cāsthirā ca yathāmbare /
GR14jnass01u:2043: tathāsthirā ca kulaṭā-prītiḥ svapnaṃ ca tad-vacaḥ // Jss_1,14.83 //
GR14jnass01u:2044: kulaṭānāṃ na satyaṃ ca na ca dharmo bhayaṃ dayā /
GR14jnass01u:2045: na laukikaṃ na lajjā syāj jāra-jintā nirantaram // Jss_1,14.84 //
GR14jnass01u:2046: svapne jāgaraṇe caiva bhojane śayane sadā /
GR14jnass01u:2047: nirantaraṃ kāma-cintā jāre sneho na cānyataḥ // Jss_1,14.85 //
GR14jnass01u:2049: jārārthe ca sutaṃ hanti bāndhavasya ca kā kathā // Jss_1,14.86 //
GR14jnass01u:2050: na hi vedā vidanty evaṃ kulatā-hṛdayaṅgamam /
GR14jnass01u:2051: kathaṃ devās ca munayaḥ santo jānanti niścayam // Jss_1,14.87 //
GR14jnass01u:2052: rati-śūraṃ priyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣīraṃ ghṛtam ivācaret /
GR14jnass01u:2053: gate vayasi jīrṇaṃ taṃ viṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā tyajet kṣaṇāt // Jss_1,14.88 //
GR14jnass01u:2054: na viśvaseyus tāṃ duṣṭo tasmāt santo hi santataṃ /
GR14jnass01u:2055: na ripuḥ puruṣāṇāṃ ca duṣṭa-strībhyaḥ paro bhuvi // Jss_1,14.89 //
GR14jnass01u:2056: viṣaṃ mantrād upaśamaṃ jalād vahniś ca niścitaṃ /
GR14jnass01u:2057: agneś ca kaṇṭhakocchannaṃ durjanaḥ stavanād vaśaḥ // Jss_1,14.90 //
GR14jnass01u:2058: lubdho dhanena rājā ca sevayā satataṃ vaśaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2059: miśraṃ svaccha-svabhāvena bhayena ca ripur vaśaḥ // Jss_1,14.91 //
GR14jnass01u:2061: bandhur vaśaḥ samatayā guruḥ praṇatibhiḥ sadā // Jss_1,14.92 //
GR14jnass01u:2062: mūrkho vaśaḥ kathāyāṃ ca vidvān vidyā-vicārataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2063: na hi duṣṭā ca kulaṭā puṃsaś ca vaśagā bhavet // Jss_1,14.93 //
GR14jnass01u:2065: na sarvasya vaśī-bhūtā vinā śṛṅgāram ulvaṇam // Jss_1,14.94 //
GR14jnass01u:2066: na prītyā na dhanenaiva na stavān na sevayā /
GR14jnass01u:2067: na prāṇa-dānato veśyā vaśī-bhūtā bhavet kṣaṇam // Jss_1,14.95 //
GR14jnass01u:2068: āhāro dvi-guṇas tāsāṃ buddhis tāsāṃ catur-guṇā /
GR14jnass01u:2069: ṣaḍ-guṇā mantraṇā tāsāṃ kāmaś cāṣṭa-gunaḥ smṛtaḥ // Jss_1,14.96 //
GR14jnass01u:2070: śaśvat-kāmā ca kulaṭā na ca tṛptiś ca krīḍayā /
GR14jnass01u:2072: divāniśaṃ ca śṛṅgāraṃ kurute tat-pumān yadi /
GR14jnass01u:2073: na tṛptiḥ kulaṭānāṃ ca pumāṃsaṃ grastum icchati // Jss_1,14.98 //
GR14jnass01u:2075: nāntakaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ nāsāṃ tṛpyati sampadām // Jss_1,14.99 //
GR14jnass01u:2076: na śreyasāṃ manas tṛptaṃ vāḍavāgnir na pāthasām /
GR14jnass01u:2077: vasundharā na rajasāṃ na puṃsāṃ kulaṭā tathā // Jss_1,14.100 //
GR14jnass01u:2078: ity evaṃ kathitaṃ kiṃcit sarvaṃ vaktuṃ ca nocitam /
GR14jnass01u:2079: lajjā bījaṃ yoṣitāṃ ca nibodha bhāskarātmaja // Jss_1,14.101 //
GR14jnass01u:2080: śrutvā ca kṛtyā-strī-vākyaṃ jahasur munayaḥ surāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2081: cukupur yoṣitaḥ sarvāḥ padmādyā lajjitāḥ suta // Jss_1,14.102 //
GR14jnass01u:2083: tat paścāt pārvatī sārdhaṃ sarasvatyā natānanā // Jss_1,14.103 //
GR14jnass01u:2084: sāvitrī rohinī svāhā vāruṇī ca ratiḥ śacī /
GR14jnass01u:2085: sarvā babhūvur ekatra pracakrur mantraṇāṃ ca tāḥ // Jss_1,14.104 //
GR14jnass01u:2086: kṛtyā-striyaḥ samāhūya tā ūcuś ca krameṇa ca /
GR14jnass01u:2087: rodhayām āsur iṣṭāṃ tāṃ sugopyāṃ api yoṣitaḥ // Jss_1,14.105 //
GR14jnass01u:2088: tasyā mukhe dadau hastaṃ suśīlā kamalālayā /
GR14jnass01u:2089: salajjitā bhava sute śāntā ceti śubhāśiṣam // Jss_1,14.106 //
GR14jnass01u:2090: sarasvatī dadau tasyai cābhimānaṃ ca dhairyatām /
GR14jnass01u:2092: sāvitrī ca dadau tasyai sauśīlyaṃ cātidurlabham /
GR14jnass01u:2093: ātma-saṃgopanaṃ caiva gāmbhīryaṃ kulato bhayam // Jss_1,14.108 //
GR14jnass01u:2095: dhik tvāṃ sva-bhāva-kulaṭāṃ lajjitā bhava sundari /
GR14jnass01u:2096: sva-mānaṃ gauravaṃ rakṣa hy asmākaṃ ca smarātura // Jss_1,14.109 //
GR14jnass01u:2097: jani labha pṛthivyāṃ ca kāya-vyūhaṃ vidhāya ca /
GR14jnass01u:2098: puṃsām aṣṭa-guṇaṃ kāmaṃ labhasva ca pṛthak prṛthak // Jss_1,14.110 //
GR14jnass01u:2099: lajjāṃ catur-guṇāṃ cāpi dviguṇāṃ dhairyatāṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:2100: abhogecchadhame gaccha dūraṃ gaccha mamāntikāt // Jss_1,14.111 //
GR14jnass01u:2101: puṃsāṃ ca dvi-guṇaḥ kāmo vāstavīṇāṃ ca yoṣitām /
GR14jnass01u:2102: lajjā cāṣṭa-guṇā cāpi dhairyatā ca catur-guṇā // Jss_1,14.112 //
GR14jnass01u:2104: śaśvat tiṣṭhatu puṃsy eva strīṣu ca mamājñayā // Jss_1,14.113 //
GR14jnass01u:2106: strī-sva-bhāvaṃ ca papraccha yajña-bhāk na bhavet tataḥ // Jss_1,14.114 //
GR14jnass01u:2108: cikitsakānāṃ viduṣāṃ na bhakṣya mamājñayā // Jss_1,14.115 //
GR14jnass01u:2109: ity evam uktvā prayayur devyaś ca sarva-yoṣitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2110: devāś ca munayaś cāpi ye cānye ca samāgataḥ // Jss_1,14.116 //
GR14jnass01u:2111: devāś ca munayaś cāpi ye cānye sarvataḥ suta /
GR14jnass01u:2112: pati-vratāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ ca lajjā bīja-svarūpiṇī // Jss_1,14.117 //
GR14jnass01u:2117: sva-yogena jahau dehaṃ bhārate prāktanād aho // Jss_1,15.1 //
GR14jnass01u:2118: sa jajñe śudra-yonau ca pituḥ śāpena ca daivataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2119: viṣṇu-prasādaṃ bhuktvā ca babhūva brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ // Jss_1,15.2 //
GR14jnass01u:2126: uvāsa tatra śambhuś ca nāradaś ca mahā-muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2127: pārvatī bhadra-kālī skando gaṇa-patiḥ svayam // Jss_1,15.6 //
GR14jnass01u:2128: mahā-kālaś ca nandī ca vīra-bhadraḥ pratāpavān /
GR14jnass01u:2129: siddhā maharṣayaś ca munayaḥ sankādayaḥ // Jss_1,15.7 //
GR14jnass01u:2131: yat stotraṃ kavacaṃ dhyānaṃ subhadrāya ca kānane // Jss_1,15.8 //
GR14jnass01u:2133: pūjā-vidhānaṃ yad yac ca puraś-caraṇa-pūrvakam // Jss_1,15.9 //
GR14jnass01u:2134: tad eva bhagavān śambhuḥ pradadau nāradāya ca /
GR14jnass01u:2135: uvāca śambhuṃ devarṣir yogināṃ ca guror gurum /
GR14jnass01u:2136: pārvatī-sannidhau tatra nāradaś ca mahā-muniḥ // Jss_1,15.10 //
GR14jnass01u:2138: sad yat pṛṣṭaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ tan māṃ vyākhyātum arhasi // Jss_1,15.11 //
GR14jnass01u:2139: yad yat pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā brahman pratyekaṃ ca krameṇa ca /
GR14jnass01u:2140: punaḥ praśnaṃ kuru mune śṛṇvantu mat-sabhāsadaḥ // Jss_1,15.12 //
GR14jnass01u:2141: ādhyātmikaṃ ca yaj jñānaṃ vedānāṃ sāram uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:2142: jñānaṃ jñāniṣu sāraṃ yat kṛṣṇa-bhakti-pradaṃ śubhaṃ // Jss_1,15.13 //
GR14jnass01u:2144: tat-siddhi-yogān muktiś ca yoginām api vāñcchitam // Jss_1,15.14 //
GR14jnass01u:2148: bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca yatīnāṃ brahma-cāriṇām // Jss_1,15.16 //
GR14jnass01u:2150: pati-vratānāṃ yad yac ca śrī-kṛṣṇa-pūjanaṃ ca yat // Jss_1,15.17 //
GR14jnass01u:2151: yat stotraṃ kavacaṃ mantraṃ puraś-caraṇam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:2152: sārvāhnikam abhīṣṭaṃ ca vipākaṃ karma-jīvinām // Jss_1,15.18 //
GR14jnass01u:2154: tayoḥ paraṃ vā yad brahma tasyāvatāra-varṇanam // Jss_1,15.19 //
GR14jnass01u:2155: kas tat kalāvatīrṇaś ca kas tad-aṃśaś tathaiva ca /
GR14jnass01u:2156: paripūrṇatamaḥ kaś ca kaḥ pūrṇaḥ kaḥ kalāṃśakaḥ // Jss_1,15.20 //
GR14jnass01u:2157: kasya vārādhane śambho kiṃ phalaṃ kiṃ yaśas tathā /
GR14jnass01u:2160: yad dattaṃ kiṃ tad deveśa tad-ārādhyaś ca kaḥ suraḥ // Jss_1,15.22 //
GR14jnass01u:2162: sudurlabhaṃ ca viśveṣu noktaṃ māṃ brahmaṇā purā // Jss_1,15.23 //
GR14jnass01u:2163: sanat-kumāro jānāti noktaṃ tena purā ca mām /
GR14jnass01u:2164: mayā jñānam anāpṛṣṭaṃ yad yaj jānāsi maṅgalam // Jss_1,15.24 //
GR14jnass01u:2166: tan me kathaya bhadreśa mām evānugrahaṃ kuru // Jss_1,15.25 //
GR14jnass01u:2168: purāṇeṣv itihāse ca vedāṅgeṣu sudurlabham // Jss_1,15.26 //
GR14jnass01u:2169: guroś ca jñānodigaraṇāt jñānaṃ syān mantra-tantrayoḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2170: tat tantaṃ sa ca mantraḥ syāt kṛṣṇa-bhaktir yato bhavet // Jss_1,15.27 //
GR14jnass01u:2171: jñānaṃ syād viduṣāṃ kiṃcid veda-vyākhyānataḥ prabho /
GR14jnass01u:2173: tasmād bhavān paraṃ jñānaṃ vada veda-vidāṃ vara /
GR14jnass01u:2174: māṃ bhaktam anuraktaṃ ca śaraṇāgatam īśvara // Jss_1,15.29 //
GR14jnass01u:2175: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā yogināṃ ca guror guruḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2176: bhagavatyā sahālocya jñānaṃ vaktuṃ samudyataḥ // Jss_1,15.30 //
GR14jnass01u:2177: ity evaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvākhyānaṃ manoharam /
